body: reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 2g thursday 6 june melbourne report 2g strength switch hi team resuming normal service few gremlins posting yesterday so thanks u matthotlips for posting and u lookie4dacookie for getting me back online i also posted the 3g in a separate thread via another member treads 1 courtesy u c01788 treads 1 i did this about 8 hours ago now but i think i ve remembered correctly 30 second base at 7 1min normal base 30sec base 7 30sec base 5 1min normal base 30sec base 7 30sec base 5 30sec base 3 1min normal base 30sec base 7 30sec base 5 30sec base 3 30sec all out 1 i believe pw s were 8 6 and 4 then 10 or higher for the all out disregard my notes from earlier which i m keep in for posterity round 1 was a series of hills going up and down the hill 7 5 and 3 mixed with base and push and varying interval lengths the longest being 90 seconds i m sorry i don t remember it in detail you ll understand why i ve forgotten when you read round 2 only so much a person can remember i can update if anyone can help me out move to floor floor 1 10 upright row weighted 10 leg raises 5 each side low row single arm on bench 10 raise on the floor but i forget exactly what sorry repeat twice and then complete one 250m row treads 2 this is a run floor combo grab a set of weights for bicep curls 160m below is 0 1 miles this is the jogger and runner combination 160m 7 push 10 bicep curls 160m 7 base 160m 5 push 10 bicep curls 160m 7 base 160m 5 base 160m 3 push 160m flat road base 10 bicep curls 160m 7 base 160m 5 base 160m 3 push i may have misremembered but i ve done my best floor 2 45 seconds on 15 seconds off repeat 3 times band around wrists low rows band as above scissor legs mid band around calves toe reaches band as above in amp amp outs enjoy

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 3g thursday 6 june 2019 melbourne report some intel i received from another member for the 3g i didn t complete this class but if you read my separate 2g update it might help 3g strength switch 6 min blocks x6 tread to rower to floor row 1 100m 150m 200m 250m 300m with 5 medicine ball squat raises in between each distance then row for distance and keep track of full distance as in next row block you row that full distance then do 25 medicine ball squat raises then row for distance floor 1 upright row x10 lay on back lift legs x10 single arm upright row on bench x5 each then lay on floor lift butt whatever they call that treads 1 6 min block can t remember all different ones but essentially 90 second 1 minute inclines at base pace with 1 minute base recovery and a 30sec all out to finish block rower 2 as above row first distance etc floor 2 band on wrists x10 low rows with trx keep band on wrists lay on floor w arms raised band tensioned and do x10 scissors kicks band on lower leg and x10 leg splits tread 2 as above if you re looking for the 2g i also posted this enjoy

reposting early intel courtesy of u matthotlips tuesday 4 june melbourne 3g today was not my finest remembering what is going on day especially with the names floor 5x alt bench toe taps with right leg 5x bench reverse leg thrust thing with right leg 10x side to side thing as if you are sat in a sit up position with a weight at your chest repeat above but this time with the left leg keep going until time is called 20 sprinter sit ups then plank until time is called 5x laying down with weight held vertical into a sit up 5 each arm 10x plank pull through tread progressive push adding 0 5 1km over base each minute for 4 minutes walk 30second ao walk base at 1 for 1 minute base at 2 for 1 minute base at 3 for 1 minute base at 4 for 1 minute base at 5 for 1 minute 30second ao rest 30second ao rower 45second row 10x jump squats repeat for three times 15 stroke row 10x reverse lunges repeat for three times 150m row 10x jumping reverse lunges repeat for three times if finished do exercises only i really might of missed a bit but you get the gist

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 2g monday 3 june 2019 melbourne report endurance and switch all floor blocks are 6 5 minutes all treadmills are flat road in advance i don t have intel on the 3g edit no shade intended by this comment i m not a coach or otf team member so i can only report on the class as i do it i honestly love the discussion and feedback my posts get and the feeling of community it builds i started on the treadmill so this was my order treads warm up only move to rower rower one minute row remember your distance move to treads treads 90 second push 60 second base 30 second push 60 second all out move to floor floor block 1 chest press x10 12 14 tricep extension x10 12 14 knee tuck x20 may have missed an exercise here move to rower rower as above try to beat your distance treads as above floor block 2 shoulder press x10 12 14 lateral raise x10 12 14 scissor legs x20 rower as above try to beat your distance treads as above floor block 3 trx chest press x10 12 14 palm to elbow x10 12 14 bike legs x20 this was a low splat day but i m drenched in sweat enjoy

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 3g sunday 2 june 2019 melbourne report strength treads 3 x 90 second base at 6 7 and 8 with recovery at base flat road finishes with 30 second all out exactly as above but 60 second intervals also finishes with a 30 second all out rower 2 5 minute row medicine ball reverse lunge x8 twisting each side repeat above but row 100m less each time continue until time called floor 2 blocks each exercise is weighted as follows block 1 7 5 minutes lateral lunge to step up x8 uppercut x8 pullover x8 toe crunch x8 12 16 block 2 5 5 minutes step up x8 double crunch x8 12 16 enjoy

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 3g friday 31 may 2019 melbourne report hi team seen the feedback that the studios don t like this sub so you have been warned spoiler alert look away now 12 minute run for distance benchmark treads 12 minute run for distance benchmark pw 4 edit courtesy u jemesct rowers 3 minute row remember your distance standing on one leg bicep curls x8 hip hinge weighted rows x16 row 200m less than your distance repeat the two weighted exercises row another 200m less etc floor 14 minute block 6 8 10 reps of the following trx y raise trx high raise row trx low row ab dolly roll out ab dolly pike and that my friends is the workout enjoy

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 2g thursday 30 may 2019 melbourne report 2g strength inclines and drop sets treadmill edit courtesy u matthotlips tread for jogger runner was first effort 3min push 1min base 1min base at 3 1min base at 4 1min base 30second ao second effort 2min push 1min base 1min base at 5 1min base at 6 1min base 30second ao third effort 1min push 1min base 1min base at 7 1min base at 8 1min base 30second ao floor block 1 drop sets on the chest press 15 stroke row just once 4x chest press heavy weight followed by 10x lighter weight 10 v sit up repeat chest press but 4 12 repeat v sit up repeat chest press but 4 14 repeat v sit up block 2 drop sets on the dead lift 15 stroke row just once 4 10 dead lift heavy lighter 10 shoulder press 10 side plank to crunch 10 sprinters sit ups repeat enjoy ps the 12 min run for distance benchmark for friday was confirmed in our studio this morning pps anyone know how to add the early intel flair there s no option but randomly my posts are being flaired anyway edit kindly answered in the comments thank you

reposting early intel courtesy of u c01788 wed 29 may 2g starting on treadmill 1min all out floor 3 min 10 side step lunge with weights proper name 10 skater lunges 10 uppcut with dumbbell 10 straight leg hip raises repeat until out of time 3 blocks like this second block is 5 min third block is 7 min 30sec all out on treadmill to finish rower 1min all out treadmill 160m all out 20 lunge jumps repeat until time is called decrease lunge jumps by 2 every round 3 blocks like this same times as above 30sec all out on rower to finish

reposting early intel courtesy of u matthotlips wednesday 29 may 2019 melbourne 3g endurance power i was very politely asked to create a separate post for the 3g workout so here it is not sure if it s called a switch or a tornado but it is definitely one of them amp x200b rower 4 min 100m row 20 reverse jump lunges rjl 100m row 18 rjl 100m row 16 rjl etc floor 4 min 10x alt side weight lunge ankle things 10x skaters 10x upper cuts 10x straight leg hip raises tread 4 min 1min push 1min base 1min push 1min ao rower 1min ao floor 1min burpees tread 1min ao then repeat all of that again picking up where you left off on the reverse lunges and floor exercises amp x200b edit really wanted to put reverse hump lunges but y knowwwww i m pretty professional

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 2g tuesday 28 may 2019 melbourne report esp switch 2g run row 1 up the ladder 250m row 800m 0 5 mile run push pace flat road pw was half the distance with incline 500m row run for distance flat road pw with incline remember your distance move to floor floor 1 10 5 minute block 1 minute of each of the following mid band forward walk then back mid band weighted rotation mid band lie on your back with legs up in the air and reach your hands towards your feet poor explanation but i hope that makes sense low band around wrists in plank position moving hands side to side repeat move to tread run row 2 down the ladder run for distance per your distance in previous block pw as above 500m row 800m 0 5 mile run push pace flat road pw as above 250m row move to floor floor 2 10 5 minute block 1 minute of each of the following mid band lateral walks i forget but can update if anyone remembers mid band hip bridge low band around wrists walking forward to plank repeat enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments r55hdb tuesday_30_november_2021_orange_everest_3g_60 tuesday 30 november 2021 orange everest 3g 60 minutes hopefully you are nice and rested for today s benchmark its a good one as the name suggests you are doing a lot of hill running today and then dying for the rest of it the treads is just one long slog up a hill first half is an increasing incline and the second half is still at incline but decreasing in intensity then you finish it with an all out i have never done the 3g before so any distance today would be a pr happy with my effort but would have been stoked if i had made it past the 3km mark was just shy of it my strategy hasn t really changed over the years start with a push or close to it and hold that for as long as possible and then decrease the further incline goes up at the top of the hill try to hold base if you can and then as the declines come off increase your speed trick is to increase speed as fast as you took it off for the first half of the climb good luck the row is a struggle coming off the run but it isn t particularly hard distance challenges with reverse lunges with a medicine ball the last minute of the row is an all out in time with the treads on the floor it is all chest back and arms with some core it s not particularly hard and most people finished well within the 14 minutes the run is the focus today and it is a brute of a challenge i think it is the third hardest after the 14 minute row for distance and dri tri i give it a 1 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 min run 2 1 min run 4 1 min run 6 1 min run 8 1 min run 10 1 min run 12 1 min run 15 1 min run 13 1 min run 11 1 min run 9 1 min run 7 1 min run 5 1 min run 3 1 min ao row block 14 minutes 500m row 12 each side x reverse lunge with medicine ball torso rotation 400m row 12 each side x reverse lunge with medicine ball torso rotation 300m row 12 each side x reverse lunge with medicine ball torso rotation 200m row 12 each side x reverse lunge with medicine ball torso rotation 100m row 12 each side x reverse lunge with medicine ball torso rotation row for distance until the last minute and then it is a 1 minute all out floor block 14 minutes 2 rounds of 8 each x bench plank single arm low row 8 x seated overhead tricep extension 8 x straight leg raise 2 rounds of 8 x close grip chest press 8 x seated hammer curl 12 total x bicycle

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments r3oliv sunday_28_november_2021_esp_2g_60_minutes sunday 28 november 2021 esp 2g 60 minutes nice pure esp template today with equal measures of endurance strength and power there are three 6 5 minute blocks each with a specific focus for the timing purists out there we did have a 90 second transition between blocks on the treads the power block is all push to all outs with a walking recovery in between on the strength block it is push at inclines with base as recovery followed by a 30 second all out on the last endurance block it is long pushes with a base followed by a 30 second all out my suggestion is to up the push and base for the power block and try to hold your normal push for the strength block see if you can also increase the all outs for the power block for the floor there are deadlifts low rows and some power moves each block starts with a short row and then the rest of the block is the repeats of the exercises i think for the strength block you can go a little bit heavier but on the endurance block drop the weights a little as your forearms and triceps will be burning by the end of the block with the lateral hop this is not the same as the speed skater as the hops are a bit shorter and you should hold it for a couple of seconds at the end of each hop not as gentle as yesterday but i quite liked it for the variety i give it a 3 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec ao tread block 2 1 min push 5 1 min base 1 min push 4 1 min base 1 min push 3 1 min base 30 sec ao 2 tread block 3 2 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 30 sec ao floor block 1 6 5 minutes 30 sec ao row once only 6 x sumo squat to upright row 12 total x lateral stability hop stick it 6 x 4 point plank floor block 2 6 5 minutes 1 min row 26 strokes minute aiming for 200 300m once only 6 each x suitcase deadlift tempo 6 each x split stance single arm low row tempo floor block 3 6 5 minutes 2 min row for distance aiming for 400 600m once only 15 x bicep curl 15 x iso hip bridge to tricep extension

reposting content courtesy of u fit_steve click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments r36d0n power_2g_sat_nov_27 power 2g sat nov 27 yes it s another power day this one felt easier than yesterday on the treads but the floor is brutal i would agree with dc they made a mistake with the name yesterday it felt like esp we can probably expect tomorrow s to be more strength based tread block 1 30 sec push 45 sec base 30 sec push 1 min base 30 sec push 75 sec base 30 sec push 90 sec base 30 sec all out tread block 2 30 sec all out with 30 sec wr 45 sec all out with 45 sec wr 1 min all out with 1 min wr 45 sec all out with 45 sec wr 30 sec all out with 30 sec wr 30 sec all out tread block 3 30 sec all out with 75 sec wr repeat 4 times floor block 1 7 min 6 dumbbell man eaters ultimate burpees just once 6 reps each side bench step up with power 6 reps each side bench low row 12 reps bench seated knee tuck floor block 2 6 5 min 6 dumbbell man eaters just once 6 reps each side squat jump 90 degree turn 6 reps each side single arm chest press 12 reps bench seated torso rotation rower block 30 sec all out row with 75 sec restercize repeat 4 rounds restercize 8 reps dumbbell ground to press

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments r26his friday_26_november_2021_power_3g_60_minutes friday 26 november 2021 power 3g 60 minutes really liked the template this morning but don t be fooled by the designation it felt more like an endurance template with all the pushes all outs and minimal walking recovery for those of you who are over the chest and arm exercises today is all about legs and core on the tread the first block alternates between short pushes bases and an all out the second block is a run for distance and the third block has a longish push to all out and a final all out to cap it off my suggestion is to try and up your push and base for the first block as even though it is a 6 minute run it won t feel that bad as you have that small recovery for the base efforts i also tried to beat half my distance from the first block with the 3 minute run for distance the reason i said that it feels like an endurance template as i still managed to get out over 2 miles on the tread which is my normal benchmark for an endurance template on the rower you have three blocks as well the first has reverse lunges as the restercise and the second jump squats lots of all out rowing today so plenty of splats on the floor we have deadlifts speed skater lunges and hip hinge swings plenty for the legs one long block where the core exercises halve each round last block is all timed with the treads and the rower i quite liked today but it is pretty challenging i give it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness mrs dc is doing the 2g so we should see that soon tread block 1 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec ao tread block 2 3 min run for distance tread block 3 45 sec push 45 sec ao 45 sec wr 45 sec ao row block 1 6 minutes reset your monitor 1 min ao row 20 total x reverse lunge repeat until time record your distance row block 2 3 minutes reset your monitor 30 sec ao row 10 x jump squat repeat until time try to beat half your distance from block 1 row block 3 45 sec push row 45 sec ao row 45 sec recovery row 45 sec ao row floor block 1 10 minutes 5 x deadlift 10 x hip hinge swing 20 total x speed skater lunges 20 10 5 x leg raise 20 10 5 x power sit up each round halve the core exercises floor block 2 45 sec of hip bridge 45 sec of v up 45 sec of hip bridge 45 sec of v up

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments r1ewhb thursday_25_november_2021_endurance_restercise_3g thursday 25 november 2021 endurance restercise 3g 60 minutes after yesterday s cluster set i was thinking of a more unflattering term today s template is a return to good old endurance work plenty of scope to play with your speeds and i think you will get splats all over the different stations on the tread block there are two sets the first plays with incline pushes and the second block is pretty straight forward with three pushes and an all out i didn t think this was too bad and i played around in the second set to keep increasing the push speed for those who think doesn t look like an endurance workout i still managed over 3 2km 2 miles in the tread block which is consistent with an endurance day the first row set has distance challenges and the second set is timed with the treads with power squats as the restercise i found on the second set the heart rate stays pretty high as the restercise is designed to get the blood pumping the floor has some good moves including more low rows i can foresee some comments here step ups and neutral full thrusters all in all i liked today s template more than yesterdays and found it challenging but very doable i give it a 2 out of 5 for reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qzvjkp tuesday_23_november_2021_power_500m_row_benchmark tuesday 23 november 2021 power 500m row benchmark 3g 60 minutes happy benchmark day today s focus is the 500m row so don t be too disappointed if it is a low splat day or you don t have too much left in the tank for any of the treadmill work no pb for me today but did get a respectable row something to build towards for the next one the format of the template is that everyone rotates through the 4 minute blocks so you are relatively fresh for the row so if you start on the rower you will do your row then the floor block and then the tread and then start the 7 minute blocks on the rower again the tread as you expect is pretty easy first round is 160m 0 1 mile runs with 30 sec walking recoveries if you are yet to do the row i would suggest just doing a base pace to keep your legs warm the second round has longer pushes but they are not challenging at all if you are missing some splats after the first round i suggest jogging the walking recoveries and doing a more aggressive push try doing a one minute all out for the last effort the floor is not too bad either all upper body and core the hardest one is probably the bench step down hammer curls but even that can be taken a bit easier by using lighter weights as the main focus of the day is on the benchmark and the rest is really just filler i found it pretty gentle and gave it a 4 out of 5 if you are not that fussed about the benchmark then it could be an easy day to skip given the workout is pretty tame for the main tread block 1 4 minutes 160m 0 1 mile run 30 sec wr repeat until time row block 1 4 minutes 500m row record your time floor block 1 4 minutes 8 x squat 4 x walkout to pushup 8 total x sprinter sit up tread block 2 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec push 1 min base 30 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao row block 2 7 minutes 400m row 10 total x reverse lunge 300m row 10 total x reverse lunge 200m row 10 total x reverse lunge repeat until time 100m row 10 total x reverse lunge floor block 2 7 minutes 6 each x step down hammer curl 8 x tempo close grip chest press 10 total x plank pull through

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qz4sj0 monday_22_november_2021_strength_2g_60_minutes monday 22 november 2021 strength 2g 60 minutes mrs dc u mrsdc031114 did the 2g this morning whilst i did the 3g nice little run row with inclines today i didn t think it looked that hard compared to the weekend s efforts and i would give it a 3 out of 5 for gentleness mrs dc agrees with me tread row block 1 10 5 minutes 400m run 0 25 miles 1 min base row 20 24 strokes minute repeat until time increasing the incline on the run by 1 each round tread row block 2 10 5 minutes 400m row 1 min base 3 repeat until time decreasing the incline by 1 each round floor block 1 10 5 minutes 2 rounds of 8 each x single arm chest press 8 each x concentration curl 2 rounds of 8 x chest fly 12 x hip hinge reverse fly if finished then repeat all exercises as a single block floor block 2 10 5 minutes 2 rounds of 8 x bench single arm low row 8 x decline pushup 2 rounds of 8 x hip hinge reverse grip low row 8 x seated shoulder press to stand if finished then repeat all exercises as a single block

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qxpbtq saturday_20_november_2021_esp_2g_60_minutes saturday 20 november 2021 esp 2g 60 minutes i totally regret all the beer champagne and hot chips i ate last night today s class is a cracker very challenging and you should be getting splats all around the studio today for those who complained about not having enough legs in the week then today is your day if you can move your legs after this class then i would be most surprised first off the tread four blocks all following the same pattern it is pretty much a 2 minute push to a 1 minute all out 1 minute walk and then another 1 minute all out the second minute of the push is a base and incline so it still feels like a push in between blocks is a solitary 1 minute walk i really like the tread block but i would only get into the green for maybe the last 5 10 seconds of the walking recoveries this tread block is pretty tough and sneaky as it feels like it should be a power block but you end up doing endurance like distances i managed just under 5km over 3 miles outside of the warmup for the entire treadmill block the floor has the same exercises on repeat but it is broken up with 1 minute all outs on the rower in time with the second all out the tread the floor exercises are pretty much all legs and backs with lateral lunges deadlifts and rows i found today s template pretty tough and i m going to give it an alcohol induced 1 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 1 min push 1 min reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qw8tw4 thursday_18_november_2021_strength_3g_60_minutes thursday 18 november 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes nice little template today as a recovery from yesterday s benchmark hope everyone did well yesterday and hit some goals in the run for the tread block today you have only three small hills all at base pace you have a 30 second all out but it only comes after a long base i didn t feel that the tread block was that challenging today and i just jogged during all the walking recoveries no sex all outs today very sorry it is a pg version of otf on offer for those who don t get this you need to read the early intel thread from yesterday the rower on the other hand had me in the orange zone for pretty much the entire block something about the lunges not jumping this time thankfully that kept the heart rate up not too many people got to the row for distance i blame the time it takes to do all the lunges with exercises on the restercise with the overhead tricep extension the coach told us to keep the medicine ball overhead whilst doing the lunge which makes it all the bit harder the floor features the bosu again for the first time since hell week i think we have shoulder presses pullovers bicycles and a new one which is the single arm press to a toe reach this is kind of like a single leg v up on the bosu but you have a weight in one arm and the other is out to the side for stability all in all i enjoyed the template i got plenty of splats but it didn t feel overly challenging i give it a 3 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 90 sec push 1 min base 45 sec base 4 45 sec base 5 45 sec base 6 1 min base 30 sec ao tread block 1 90 sec push 1 min base 45 sec base 6 45 sec base 5 45 sec base 4 1 min base 30 sec ao row block 1 6 5 minutes 1 min ao row 16 x reverse lunge with overhead tricep extension 45 sec ao row 16 x reverse lunge with overhead tricep extension 30 sec ao row 16 x reverse lunge with overhead tricep extension 15 sec ao row 16 x reverse lunge with overhead tricep extension row for distance row block 1 6 5 minutes 15 sec ao row 16 x reverse lunge with bicep curl 30 sec ao row 16 x reverse lunge with bicep curl 45 sec ao row 16 x reverse lunge with bicep curl 1 min ao row 16 x reverse lunge with bicep curl row for distance floor block 1 6 5 minutes 12 total x bosu kneeling alternating should press 8 x bosu pullover 12 total x bosu bicycle floor block 2 6 5 minutes 8 each x bosu single arm press to a toe reach 8 x upright row 6 each x side plank rotation

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qvi7o6 wednesday_17_november_2021_endurance_12_minute wednesday 17 november 2021 endurance 12 minute run for distance 3g 60 minutes everyone who has been here for a while knows this template it s the 12 minute run plenty of threads on how to prep for this and strategies for the day my personal strategy is to do set and forget and depending on how you feel you creep it up to an all out for the last 30 60 seconds i wasn t confident on doing a pb coming out of lockdown so my goal is to maintain a minimum of 16 kmh 10 mph for the entire 12 minutes one of the coaches set a new studio record by holding 20 kmh 12 5 mph for the entire run nuts the rower is an endurance row with jump lunges as the restercises between efforts my suggestion is to not go too hard on this if you still have the run to go if you have done your run then whatever you can push through is effort enough on the floor it is all pretty light as you would expect ab dolly work seated torso rotations and some light trx work this is just filler time for the run apart from the run this is pretty a pretty cruisy template i give it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block reset your monitor 12 minute run for distance record your distance row block 13 5 minutes 400m row 16 x alternating jump lunges 350m row 16 x alternating jump lunges 300m row 16 x alternating jump lunges 250m row 16 x alternating jump lunges 200m row 16 x alternating jump lunges 150m row 16 x alternating jump lunges 100m row 16 x alternating jump lunges row for distance floor block 13 5 minutes 8 each x balance bicep curl 20 total x seated torso rotation 12 x ab dolly knee tuck 12 x ab dolly pike 12 each x trx single arm low row 12 x trx tricep extension

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qvivuv wednesday_17_november_2021_endurance_12_minute wednesday 17 november 2021 endurance 12 minute run for distance 2g 60 minutes mrs dc u mrsdc031114 did the 2g she didn t think it was the hardest outside of the run and gave it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness in terms of the order if you do the first tread block you will be doing this tread block 1 floor block 1 tread row block 2 floor block 2 this way you get the run out of the way early and keep your legs relatively fresh tread block 1 reset your monitor 12 min run for distance record your distance tread row block 2 7 minutes 400m row 12 x alternating jump lunges 300m row 12 x alternating jump lunges 200m row 12 x alternating jump lunges 100m row 12 x alternating jump lunges row for distance floor block 1 14 minutes 8 each x balance bicep curl 16 x ab dolly knee tuck 20 x seated torso rotation 12 each x trx single arm low row 400m row once only floor block 2 6 minutes 12 x trx tricep extension 12 x upper cuts 12 x ab dolly pike

reposting content courtesy of u thmpsne click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments e6m6vg friday_12_dec_6_legs_a_shakin friday 12 dec 6 legs a shakin good morning world intel from chch nz i never go to 6am class but today i did you re welcome can t remember the proper names for all the floor exercises but you ll get the gist amp x200b 2g amp x200b floor block 1 6x all on left side single leg sit to bench the vva screen demo demo diane was doing these with the opposite leg s heel on the ground which made it much more doable than the one with the leg hanging in the air stand on bench single leg lateral toe touch things single leg power step ups on bench repeat on right repeat both sides amp x200b 6x weighted bench sit ups 12x toe reaches repeat from the beginning until block is done amp x200b block 2 6x all on left side s a shoulder press with reverse lunge s a upright row lateral lunge repeat on right 150m row repeat until block is over amp x200b treadmill yeah it s a toughy but goody i started on the rowers and would recommend that amp x200b runners at an aggressive push starting at 1 incline 1 min all out 90 second wr at 1 repeat all the way until 10 try to maintain that aggressive push throughout pw bikes i m really sorry i can t remember this i was preoccupied trying to convince myself i could do anything for 1 min amp x200b lastly wonder why you put yourself through xmas hell week for a pair of socks enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments e64hsk thursday_endurance_500_reps thursday endurance 500 reps ok there is alot to this workout and can seem confusing at times especially if you were me and went at 5am in the morning thank god there is no inclines today my legs are crying after yesterday s hills it is a partner workout all the class is on the floor for some of the workout 45 minute block partner 1 320 metre run floor 15 medball squat jump to front press 15 medball iso squat front press 20 medball abdominal rotations x 5 partner 2 300 metre row floor 15 bicep curls 15 front squat with weight 10 overhead presses 10 sumo squat then squat jump x5 ok so the treadmill does their 5 x of their runs to floor and the rower does their 5 x rower to floor and whoever finishes first swaps with the other in our class the treadmill swapped with the rower when they were up to their 3rd or 4th round if you finish you get rid of the floor reps and just run and 320 metres and swap with your rower friend so sorry if that doesn t make any sense i did my best have a fab day everyone

saturday 13 november 2021 endurance the chipper 2g 60 minutes today s class is a real treat i love the chipper such a good endurance challenge on all of the stations one of my all time favourite templates i am pretty sure this is a hell week template that they decided to put into the signature workout rotation the tread is pretty simple start with a 3 minute push and then you chip away at it 30 seconds off every push effort until you get to 90 seconds and then it is 15 seconds off each effort finishes with three 30 second pushes and a 30 second all out extra points if you can turn the final push to all out into a one minute all out i think if you are looking to really push it today try increasing your push speeds a little with each effort you will get some pretty impressive distances today i ended up with over 5 6 km 3 5 miles excluding the warmup so it is a good time to do a little bit more training before the 12 minute run on wednesday the floor is also pretty crazy huge numbers of reps combined with neverending rows i was in the orange zone pretty much the entire floor block as well the only real rest you get is the walk back from the rower to the floor if you are pushing it then try jogging it back if you need to catch your breath then take it nice and slow this template is definitely is a 1 out of 5 for gentleness but it is super fun i haven t had this many splats since hell week tread block 3 min push 1 min base 2 5 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 90 sec push 1 min base 75 sec push 1 min base 1 min push 1 min base 45 sec push 1 min base monday 24 may 2021 mayhem 2 clock won t stop 2g 3g 60 minutes ok personally i didn t find it as hard as yesterday but it is all up to how you approach the run and the row blocks every session today is being run as a 3g so you will not escape the row block for the treads it is all run for distances with short walking recoveries if you want to really push yourself then treat these as max efforts but be warned that the recovery times are not nearly enough to get your heart rate back down i did these at around push pace and found it tough but doable the kicker is that you get a couple of all outs at the end to prepare you for the row block if you are doing the tread first or second the row block is also tough first you have 2000m to get through but the trick is that when the treads are doing walking recoveries you are doing 20 squat jacks once you finish the 2000m you have the rest of the block to get out 4 x 150m rows with more squat jacks oh and you have a squat hold at the end to do this one try and pump out the 2000m as quick as you can so you don t need to do all the squat jacks and then time the 4 other rows so you don t have to squat hold for minutes the floor block features a lot of ultimate burpees and core work you will be pretty fatigued by then so try to break up the core work into sets of 10s or 25s pretty tough today but i didn t think it was as bad as yesterday still a 1 out of 5 for gentleness though not easy at all tread block 3 min run for distance 30 sec wr 2 5 min run for distance 30 sec wr 2 min run for distance 30 sec wr 90 sec run for distance 30 sec reposting content courtesy of u swiftiebean click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nev4om 2g_60min_185_power_load_explode 2g 60min 18 5 power load amp explode there s a better explanation in the 3g post about the workout but here s the specific 2g format we were encouraged to continually increase our push and ao speeds throughout the tread blocks and go super heavy on the floor personally i really enjoyed today s format and felt like i definitely got in a good full workout tread block 1 6 5 min 2 min push 30 sec ao 90 sec wr 2 min push 30 sec ao tread block 2 6 5 min 1 min push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 1 min push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 1 min push 30 sec ao tread block 3 7 min 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1min wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao floor block 1 6 5 min 15 stroke strong row 100m ao row 15 stroke recovery row do twice then move to floor 8 x chest press 4 x power push up repeat until time floor block 2 6 5 min 12 stroke strong row 100m ao row 12 stroke recovery row do twice then move to floor 8 x hip hinge low row 4 x trx power pull up repeat until time floor block 3 7 min 10 stroke strong row 100m ao row 10 stroke recovery row do twice then move to floor 16 x seated torso rotation 8 x power sit up with rotation

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nd96h3 sunday_16_may_2021_endurance_the_chipper_2g_60 sunday 16 may 2021 endurance the chipper 2g 60 minutes today is one of those special workouts not sure if it is a signature but it sure feels like it on the treadmill it is a 22 5 minute straight workout starting with a 3 minute push and working its way down pretty straight forward and i like how the pushes decrease but the bases stay the same so i didn t have the same sense of impending doom with normal endurance blocks if you can try to either increase your base or push towards the end as the durations shorten the floor is a monster i did see the chest flys and curls and thought i may not be able to handle it after yesterday but it to be honest it all blends into each other you will definitely get splats on the floor your reward for finishing the floor exercises is to do it all again minus the row i finished with maybe 5 minutes to go so i was not particularly enthused about that prospect pretty tough class today lots of splats on offer i rate today s template a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 3 min push 1 min base 2 5 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 90 sec push 1 min base 75 sec push 1 min base 1 min push 1 min base 45 sec push 1 min base 30 sec push 1 min base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec ao floor block 22 5 minutes 40 x bench tap squat 400m row 35 x bench straight leg raise 350m row 30 x sumo squat to upright row 300m row 25 x trx low row 250m row 20 total x palm to elbows 200m row 15 x chest fly 150m row 10 total x step up to bicep curl 100m row if finished then just do the exercises as a single set

reposting content courtesy of u kaorian click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments e18dt9 monday_25th_of_november_3g_sydney_power monday 25th of november 3g sydney power did you miss burpees well miss them no more they make an appearance in today s switch workout first switch is one minute on each station followed by the bulk of the class in usual 3g rotation followed by another 1 minute switch betty o meter about a 6 i didn t feel like i was dying at any point 21 splats which is about my average or rather median for the statistically inclined switch round 1 treads 60s ao note your distance rower row for distance note your distance floor full burpees with bench jump over burpees only on one side 1min go back to whatever station you started on treads bit fuzzy on exact timings on these folks soz it s been 5 hours since my workout and my brain has moved on to other things 90s push 60s wr 60s ao 60s wr 60s push 60s wr 60s ao 60s wr 30s push 30s wr 30s ao floor do each exercise 10 8 6 times push up to plank jack seating shoulder press to stand thanks nsking83 for the name reminder on this dumbell squat to shoulder press knee to elbow sit up rowers row whatever distance you achieved in the first switch session on the rowers medicine ball squat x 10 medicine ball squat chest to shoulder press x 10 medicine ball squat floor to shoulder press x 10 row same distance as above and drop 2 reps medicine ball squat x 8 medicine ball squat chest to shoulder press x 8 medicine ball squat floor to shoulder press x 8 keep going until time is called switch round 2 treads 60s ao try to beat your distance from first switch block rower row for distance try to beat your distance from first switch block floor full burpees with bench jump over burpees only on one side 1min

reposting content courtesy of u tohelluride click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments e07vv1 saturday_112319_otf_workout_2g_endurance_switch saturday 11 23 19 otf workout 2g endurance switch good morning from sydney nothing too crazy about this workout enjoy it and your weekend treads switch after each block no walking recoveries block 1 6 5 min 120 sec push 60 sec base 60 sec push 60 sec base 90 sec run for distance block 2 6 5 min 90 sec push 75 sec base 60 sec push 75 sec base 90 sec run for distance block 3 6 5 min 60 sec push 90 sec base 60 sec push 90 sec base 90 sec run for distance floor switch after each block block 1 6 5 min 6 each x single leg pistol squat to bench thing 12 total x lateral step up 12 total x hip hinge with lateral raise complete 3 rounds then row until time block 2 6 5 min 6 or 12 x of something start of block 2 3 are a blur will edit if someone can help me remember 6 each x step up followed by scaption dumbbell raise thanks u benton9439 amp u 716pete1980 12 total x plank with alternating dumbbell row complete 3 rounds then row until time block 3 6 5 min 6 x bench sit up followed by squat jump 12 x trx bridge row 6 x pop jack complete 3 rounds then row until time

reposting content courtesy of u kaorian click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments e0ajo0 saturday_23rd_of_november_3g_sydney saturday 23 rd of november 3g sydney sorry it took me so long to post today folks i had baby bats to feed they are stinky and uncoordinated and they scratched me silly took ages to get them cleaned and fed anyway nice and balanced workout but challenging enough good start to the weekend treads block 1 90s push 60s base 60sc push 60s base 90 sec run for distance note of your distance switch to rower block 2 60s push 75s base base 60s push 75s base 90s run for distance try to match or exceed previous block distance rowers block 1 150m row 12 jumping jack squats 250m row 12 jumping jack squats 350m row 12 jumping jack squats row for distance note of your distance switch to floor block 1 150m row 20 jumping jack squats 250m row 20 jumping jack squats 350m row 20 jumping jack squats row for distance try to match or exceed previous block distance floor block 1 single leg squat to bench x 6 each lateral step up x 12 total hip hinge reverse fly x 12 repeat until time switch to treads block 2 sit up to jumping squat x 6 step up with scaption raise x 12 plank alt low row x 12 total repeat until time psa for the week if you ever get scratched or bitten by a bat go to the er immediately as they carry rabies or the lyssavirus if you re in australia it s a virus related to the rabies one please note i said scratched as well the virus is shed in the saliva and they groom like cats so a scratch can get the virus into your nervous system ok psa over

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qmug2h friday_5_november_2021_endurance_12_minute_run friday 5 november 2021 endurance 12 minute run prep 3g 60 minutes no hell week castoffs today we have a relatively normal template other than the 2 x 5 5 minute run for distances for the run we had the option of doing the 12 minute run straight instead of breaking it up up to you really it is a good gauge for how you will go in the actual benchmark i normally just look at the distance at the end of the first block and multiply that by around 2 2 to get your projected distance not too bad today given how sore i was after yesterday but got blitzed by one of the coaches who was taking the class who ran the two blocks at the max treadmill speed 20 kmh or 12 5 mph generally my strategy on the practice runs is to do a set and forget for the first block and then on the second start where you left off and creep up the speed as you go the row block is tough but doable distance challenges with a restercise essentially set your distance goal with a 90 second row at the start and then you are chipping away at it for the rest of the block the floor block features the mini bands again haven t seen these since before lock down so it was like seeing an old friend and then realising why they annoyed you so much i don t expect to feel my glutes again for the rest of the day and i now also have little bald patches on the legs where they rub off the hair i modified the weights section as i hate all the balance work and just did heavy bench single arm low rows chest press and normal bicep curls a lot more doable than yesterday s hell session i give today s workout a 2 out of 5 for gentleness there is plenty of transition between stations the blocks are only 12 5 minutes so you may find your heart rate dipping a bit today unlike yesterday tread block reset monitor 5 5 min run for distance 90 sec wr 5 5 min run for distance row block 12 5 minutes reset row monitor 90 sec row for distance record your distance repeat until time row distance again taking off 50m each round 10 x medicine ball halos if you get to 0 then row for distance floor block 12 5 minutes 3 rounds of 8 x mid band static crunch in and out 8 x mid band hip bridge 12 x mid band seated knee tuck repeat until time 8 each x bench bird dog single arm low row 8 each x single arm chest press 8 each x balance bicep curl 16 total x plank pull through

november 2021 esp 3g 60 minutes i think the otf gods forgot that tomorrow is the 12 minute prep and not today kind of felt like a 12 minute and everest prep in the same class pretty tough workout today especially with the incline distance challenges and the power moves on the floor the tread is broken into a endurance strength and power block the 3 minute distance challenge is a real lung burner but then the legs get a workout in the next block with serious inclines the last block should be a power challenge but when did we start calling the 90 second run for distance and all out you are to record your first distance in the first block and use that throughout i don t think anyone got 1 km 0 625 miles but i got reasonably close the second block you are to try and match and beat your distance but will be super challenging given the inclines starts at 12 the rower is also pretty hard you have a 3 minute distance challenge in the first block and then a 5 minute block to beat it with restercizes the last block is timed with the treads my rule of thumb is that generally if you are doing a push or an all out you should get similar distances on the rower i managed just over a 1 km which is about what i got on the treads the floor was pretty tough after the treadmill and rower and i was pretty spent you have loads of power moves including burpees plank jacks and ground to press if you are pushing hard you should get splats on the floor as well wasn t a huge fan of all the jumping moves on the floor today was pretty tough similar in intensity to yesterdays power workout reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments qhw0u1 friday_29_october_2021_hell_week_6_meltdown_2g_60 friday 29 october 2021 hell week 6 meltdown 2g 60 minutes disclaimer i really enjoyed this workout even though it is extremely difficult on the plus side there are no inclines and the floor work is pretty simple though designed to give you lots of splats for those of you whom liked the 14 minute row for distance the other day there is plenty here for you to like if you don t like to row then i suggest you do not go to a 2g today as you will spend half the class on the rower the tread block is a run floor block this is a first for me after all so many years of going to otf i quite liked it but you don t have very long on the treadmills basically you are doing an all out at flat road on the treadmill and then heading over to the floor to do variations of snatches am expecting a few comments on this today as the power move coupled with stability exercises the furthest distance you will have to run is 400m 0 25 miles my suggestion is to treat all of the run blocks as an all out and don t go too heavy on the weights unless you are brave it is too easy to do yourself an injury on the snatches and the step ups and you will be fatigued from the run i was in the orange zone the entire block if you are missing the inclines from the previous hell week templates feel free to add some incline to your all outs on the rower it is a 4 5 minute row for distance and the variations of all out and recovery rows in 3 blocks afterwards each time you are trying to beat your previous best distance our coach took mercy and said to get within 100m of your best but i think it is really to beat your previous distance all in all this is a tough template simple but designed to keep your heart rate in the orange red zone the entire time this gave me the second highest splats out of hell week i give this a 1 out of 5 for gentleness and 4 out of 5 for hell week mrs dc u mrsdc031114 is doing the 3g so will see how that compares my feeling is that it will be a lot more manageable big shout out to my studio for cracking the global top 10 in the 14 minute row for distance huge averages given how many people we had do the class that day tread floor block 23 minutes 160m 0 1 mile run reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments lj8z41 sunday_14_february_2021_strength_2g_60_minutes sunday 14 february 2021 strength 2g 60 minutes today is a strength class but to be honest it felt like a continuation of the endurance workout yesterday my wife did a double class yesterday so she is already dreading this one with longish runs and rows the dreaded sit to stand comes back i haven t seen one of these in ages and the long floor block all has lots of single arm leg combos i get it singles for valentine s day if you want to get to the bonus round in the run then my suggestion is not to go too hard in the upfront tread and row block i treated them like all outs and only just finished the row in the run row block tread block 1 3 min run for distance 90 sec to transition to rower row block 1 3 min row for distance run row block 14 minutes run your distance from tread block 1 row your distance from row block 1 16 x reverse lunge run half your distance from previous run block 3 row half your distance from previous row block 8 x reverse lunge run half your distance from previous run block 5 row half your distance from previous row block 4 x reverse lunge run for distance 1 floor block 1 7 5 minutes 6 each x single arm neutral half thruster 6 each x single leg v up 8 each x single leg sit to stand floor block 2 14 minutes 2 rounds of 6 each x bench single arm fly 6 each x single arm split stance high row 6 each x single arm chest press 2 rounds of 6 each x trx bicep curl 6 each x trx low row 6 each x half kneel to lateral step up

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments lh5asj thursday_11_february_2021_power_3g_60_minutes thursday 11 february 2021 power 3g 60 minutes make a friend now i know why the previous days have been so gentle this template is pretty tough particularly on the row the tread portion of this template only has three all outs so it did feel more like an endurance session rather than power on the rower you are basically paired up with the person next to you alternating short row efforts i don t think i have had that many splats on the rower before it could be who you get paired up with but we were going pretty hard the entire block the legs were pretty dead by the time i got to the floor and then you are faced with low bench burpees to squat jacks and full thrusters good fun but is a pretty challenging class tread block 1 2 min push 1 min base 30 sec push 30 sec ao tread block 2 90 sec push 1 min base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec ao tread block 3 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec ao row block 1 4 minutes alternate 100m ao rows with your partner partner does recovery row when you are doing your ao row record total distance row block 2 4 minutes alternate 150m ao rows with your partner partner does recovery row when you are doing your ao row record total distance try to beat your distance from block 1 row block 3 4 minutes alternate 200m ao rows with your partner partner does recovery row when you are doing your ao row record total distance try to beat your previous distances floor block 14 minutes 3 rounds of 10 8 6 x low bench burpee to squat jack 8 x trx bicep curl 3 rounds of 10 8 6 x low bench reverse lunge to hop 8 x trx chest press 10 8 6 x full thruster 8 x low bench plank jack

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments lgd0sp wednesday_10_february_2021_strength_3g_60_minutes wednesday 10 february 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes another gentle template two days in a row i feel like the otf template designers have a heart after all maybe because it is valentine s day soon today does feel more like a strength power day especially with the row block treadmill block has a few nasty inclines but they always have a similar length base pace at flat road to follow if you want an extra challenge keep the inclines for the all outs max all out is 45 seconds the floor has a little bit of strength work but not that much to be honest most of it is core work don t expect to be challenged here unless you up your weights for the step up and bicycle press tomorrow is a signature workout called make a friend the coach said that this will be a partner workout tread block 1 1 min base 6 1 min base 45 sec base 7 45 sec base 30 sec base 8 30 sec ao tread block 2 45 sec ao 1 min wr 45 sec ao tread block 3 30 sec base 8 45 sec base 45 sec base 7 1 min base 1 min base 6 30 sec ao row block 1 4 5 minutes 100m row 12 x medicine ball ground to press repeat adding 50m to the row each time record the round you got up to row block 2 45 sec ao row 1 min recovery row 45 sec ao row row block 3 4 5 minutes 100m row 12 x medicine ball squat to press repeat adding 50m to the row each time try to get to the same round as block 1 floor block 1 8 minutes 8 each x lateral step up 12 x bench sit to stand optional use a dumbbell 12 total x bench decline mountain climbers 12 total x bench torso rotation floor block 2 4 5 minutes 12 total x bicycle chest press 8 each x side plank rotation

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments l8v30u sunday_31_january_2021_esp_2g_60_minutes sunday 31 january 2021 esp 2g 60 minutes can t believe it is february already tomorrow pretty tough template with quite a few all outs the strength portion of the block is quite rough with steep inclines and then a sneaky one minute all out at the end all tread blocks have a 90 second walking recovery and there is always a 1 minute transition to the rower on the floor i would start the tread block with a aggressive push 1 2 kmh higher than your normal push but you will be back to your normal push pace for the last block i was dying on the last tread block knowing there was a 1 minute all out given all the steep inclines there wasn t really any rest in that one i hate side plank leg lift so i just did situps with rotations you could also do static crunch heel taps i also dislike the balance bicep curls just do normal ones if you are like me but 12 reps rather than 6 each side tread block 1 30 push 30 base 30 push 30 ao 1 min wr 30 push 30 base 30 ao 1 min wr 30 push 30 ao 1 min wr 30 ao tread block 2 1 min push 30 sec base 90 sec push 45 sec base 2 min push 1 min base 45 sec ao tread block 3 30 sec push 3 30 sec base 1 30 sec push 5 30 sec base 1 30 sec push 7 30 sec base 1 30 sec push 9 1 min ao 1 floor block 1 6 5 minutes 4 each side x single arm clean to press 6 each side x balance bicep curls 8 each side x side plank leg lift row block 1 1 min to transition to rower 30 sec ao row floor block 2 5 75 minutes 6 x trx pull up explosive tempo 6 each side x hollow hold single arm close grip chest press 16 x plank pull through row block 2 1 min to transition to rower 45 sec ao row floor block 3 2 5 minutes 6 x power push up 8 x hip hinge reverse grip low row row block 3 1 min to transition to rower 1 min ao row

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments l3k4xx sunday_24_january_2021_endurance_2g_60_minutes sunday 24 january 2021 endurance 2g 60 minutes nice endurance template today high splats on the treadmill and you will get some on the floor as well as you move into the row blocks all of the all outs are 1 minute today and they all follow a short push effort to get your lungs burning for tread block 2 and 3 we were asked to reset and compare your distances furthest in class was around the 2 2km 1 375 miles it will be quite hard to beat your distances if you just do your normal push or base in the last block you will probably need to up both to beat the distance our coach also put out a challenge to do the 30 sec push to 1 min all out as a 90 sec all out no thanks we were also asked to compare the 3 min row distance to the 90 second one and try to beat half your distance from the first round the 3 min row was pretty rough after the long tread blocks so you should be able to beat it tread block 1 3 min push 1 min base 30 sec push 1 min ao tread block 2 2 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 30 sec push 1 min ao tread block 3 1 min push 1 min base 1 min push 1 min base 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec push 1 min ao floor block 1 14 5 minutes 3 min row for distance once only record your distance 2 rounds of 10 each side x single leg dead lift 10 x bench sit up to stand 2 rounds of 10 each side x bench static lunge 10 x hip hinge reverse fly if finished then do all exercises as a single block floor block 2 5 minutes 10 15 20 x hip bridge 10 15 20 x double crunch 20 x seated torso rotation row block 90 seconds 90 sec row for distance beat half of your 3 minute row distance

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments na8x6u wednesday_12_may_2021_2000m_row_benchmark_3g_60 wednesday 12 may 2021 2000m row benchmark 3g 60 minutes happy benchmark day toughest of the row benchmarks the 2000m row definitely recommend starting on the row if you are aiming for a good time for me the focus is on the row and the rest of the template is a bit of a blur of trying to recover your arms and legs post row the floor has some light leg exercises but most of it is core work on the treadmill it is 480m repeats with increasing sets of inclines if you are interested then the highest incline anyone got to in the class was 6 for the row my recommendation is to settle into a pace for the first 1000m that gets into the orange zone and then look to build from there i aim to not do a high tempo and keep my stroke rate around 30 strokes per minute for the last 500m i up the stroke rate and try to maintain the wattage and for the last 250m this is an all out or as close to an all out as i can manage fastest in our class today was 5 54 i got a pb but nowhere near that pace for this template i give it a 2 out of 5 mainly because of the row and the nasty tread block some of you have asked if you can support a charity of my choosing one of my friends is doing the tour de cure walk for cancer if you would like to support this then you can pledge at https tourdecure grassrootz com can4cancer sydney 2021 walk danielle malone any amount would be gratefully accepted tread block 13 minutes 480m 0 3 miles run up to 1 min wr repeat adding 1 to the incline each round row block 13 minutes 2000m row record your time 100m row 12 x reverse lunges repeat adding 50m to each round floor block 13 minutes 20 total x reverse lunge 12 x trx alligators 12 x palm to elbows 12 x sit up 8 each x lateral lunge to upright row

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments n806h4 sunday_9_may_2021_esp_2g_60_minutes sunday 9 may 2021 e sp 2g 60 minutes happy mother s day for the mums in australia especially mrs dc for your mother s day you get a strength and power workout good news the inclines only go up to 6 and there is heaps of walking recovery in here on the treads there is four blocks blocks 2 and 4 are the power blocks blocks 1 and 3 have a short push pace to start and then you just alternate between base at flat road and base at an incline max incline in block 3 is the 6 i didn t find it as hard as yesterday and there is a lot of walking between the blocks the floor has very little rowing for a change the floor features a strength move first followed by some power core work today is a good day to go heavy on the dead lift and the sumo goblet squats all in all i felt this was pretty gentle i give today s template a 4 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 90 sec push 30 sec base 1 min base 4 30 sec base 1 min base 3 30 sec base 1 min base 2 30 sec base 30 sec ao tread block 2 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec ao tread block 3 90 sec push 30 sec base 1 min base 6 30 sec base 1 min base 5 30 sec base 1 min base 4 30 sec base 30 sec ao tread block 4 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec ao floor block 1 7 minutes 8 x sumo goblet squat 8 x low bench squat jack 12 total x alt forward lunge 12 total x plank to alt rotation floor block 2 30 sec ao row 1 min recovery row 30 sec ao row floor block 3 7 minutes 8 x dead lift 6 each side x low bench reverse lunge to hop 12 total x plank to alt leg lift floor block 4 30 sec ao row 1 min recovery row 30 sec ao row

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments n79cnb saturday_8_may_2021_endurance_2g_60_minutes saturday 8 may 2021 endurance 2g 60 minutes what are the template designers at orange hq thinking endurance after the orange everest they are mad 23 minutes straight on the treadmill with a nasty 4 minute push i was on struggle street with the treadmill today and had to drop my base pace to recover a bit for the tread especially if you have done everest my suggestion is if you are struggling then pick either push or base to drop a little bit and try to hold that i chose to keep my push pace and drop the base i have to say where was this template last month i managed to get 5 761 km 3 6 miles which would have been handy during marathon month the floor isn t too bad heaps of lower body work with trx a few rows but pretty manageable they have a few weird moves like the iso single leg dead lift with low row but they aren t too bad for today s template i give it a 1 out of 5 for gentleness i think this is the punishment for those who late cancelled yesterday to skip everest and extra punishment for those who dared think they could back it up the next day tread block 3 min push 3 min base 4 min push 2 min base 1 min push 1 min base 2 min push 2 min base 3 min push 1 min base 1 min ao floor block 1 10 minutes 300m row once only 2 rounds of 12 x alt sumo deadlift 8 10 each x split stance single arm low row 12 x good morning once you have finished the exercises get on the rower and row for distance floor block 2 11 minutes 2 rounds of 10 x trx squat to reach amp rotate 10 x trx squat to an i raise 10 x iso single leg deadlift with medicine ball low row once finished the exercises do a 600m row and then repeat exercises til time

core burning the treadmill has three blocks none of the all outs are longer than 30 seconds and the longest push is only 45 seconds it s a good day to up your push and base pace if you want to get some decent splats on the treadmill i tried a push of 18kmh 11 25 mph and a base of 15 kmh 9 4 mph for fun and got a decent mileage 3 4 km or 2 13 miles for the block on the rower it is all timed with the treadmill but the second block features high knees and squat jumps on the floor it is all pretty ordinary except for the second block where it features pikes on the ab dolly and pushups with rotations we were told to sub out the pushups for a high plank if it got too hard wasn t too bad today but some parts were reasonably challenging second floor and row blocks i am looking at you i give reposting early intel courtesy of u ponbon12 friday 23 august 3g notes tread row switch so if you start at the tread you do tread row tread move to the rower you do another row tread row then move to the floor rower and tread are timed together about 4 mins it s esp day tread 2 mins push 1 min base 160m all out 1 min to finish this wr for the rest of the time 10 incline then switch to row rower 200m 10 x squat jack 150m 10 x squat jack 100m 10 x squat jack repeat the 100m and 10 squat jack if you are finished then switch to tread floor 40 30 20 10 x bench jump over 40 30 20 10 x running man 40 30 20 10 x scissor cross crunch 10 rep exercises 10 x dumbbell highrow 10 x plank jack 10 x dumbbell upright row 10 x plank punch do the first three exercises at 40 then do the 10 rep exercises then do the first three exercises at 30 continued by the 10 rep exercises edit changed from power day to esp day thanks for the correction

reposting early intel courtesy of u starite987 friday 23 august esp 2g friday 23 august esp 2g note it s a run and run row block run row block as follows 3 mins 160m all out pace 150m row once done back to treadmill to enjoy a short wr before next block block 1 2 min push pace 90 sec base pace run row block from above block 2 2 min push pace 60 sec base pace run row block from above block 3 2 min push pace 30 sec base pace run row block from above block 4 1 min base pace 30 sec all out pace 30 sec wr 30 sec all out pace 30 sec wr 30 sec all out pace 30 sec wr 30 sec all out pace floor block 1 18mins bench hop over mountain climbers static crunch over under hip hinge low row plank jack upright row plank punch iso hip bridge chest fly notes first 3 exercises are 40 30 20 10 decrease with each round last 5 exercises are 10 reps each goal get all the way down the rep count and then work your way back up block 2 30 sec all out row x 4 times 30 sec base row in between this last block is timed together with the last tread block enjoy it was a killer workout for me

reposting early intel courtesy of u matthotlips thursday 21 august 2g espn wednesday 21 august floor rower block 1 10 mins 6 8 10 x deadlifts 6 x goblet lateral lunge each 6 x step up each repeat increasing deadlifts until time is called block 2 9 minutes 75 second row just once remember distance 6 x reverse lunge to curl each 12 x hip bridge 12 x erm hold a weight to your chest whilst sat down and turn side to side think watching tennis whilst sat down right at the net repeat until time is called block 3 75 second row tread block 1 10 minute run for distance at 1 record distance walking recovery block 2 5 minute run for distance at 2 try to match half of previous distance walking recovery block 3 2min 30sec run for distance at 3 try to match half of previous distance walking recovery block 4 75 second run for distance at 4 try to match half of previous distance notes pen and paper are provided it was hard but very rewarding try not to go too hard on the first tread block otherwise you ll be in the same state i am espn endurance strength power not not going to bother saying what type of workout in future after all the comments yesterday wednesday can t change the title edit if i was to do this workout again i d 100 start on the tread

reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 3g thursday 15 august 2019 3g esp notes this is not a switch i had a great vacation thanks treads times might be slightly out bear with me 90 second push 60 second base 60 second push 60 second base feel like i may have missed an ao here 30 second push 60 second ao wr 60 second push 30 second ao wr 90 second run for distance rowers 400m row medicine ball ground to press x10 250m row repeat medicine balls g2p 100m row repeat medicine balls g2p 90 second row for distance remember distance 90 seconds of the medicine ball g2p remember the number of g2p s you did row half your distance from the 90sec block do half your g2p s from the 90sec block floor _one_ 8 5 minutes low bench lunges with weights x6 each side this is the only floor move in the 3g that is weighted low bench lunge hops x6 each side low bench in and outs with hands body kind of in a plank position x6 each side side crunches x6 _two_ 4 minutes single leg v up hip raises toe reach rep count is 2 4 6 8 10 etc til time called suzop  o uo  i enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u livingmemory click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments f2jwsr 3g_wednesday_12_february_2020 3g wednesday 12 february 2020 power i did this class hours ago and can see that no one has posted the intel so here s as best as i can remember it i don t know the 2g treads two blocks block 1 is along the lines of 1 min push 1 min base 1 min ao wr 30 sec ao wr i may have missed a push interval here block 2 is along the lines of 1 min push 1 min base 45 second push base recovery maybe 90s 1 min ao wr 30 sec ao wr 30 sec ao wr the tread blocks seem short but i managed to run 3km s excluding the warmup so i felt it was a decent block of work rowers also two blocks timed with the treads block 1 is 150m row 12 reverse lunges 150m row 10 reverse lunges continue as above only reducing the lunges by 2 block 2 is a continous row matching the tread block ie if they re all out you re all out etc etc floor 14 mins mini band three steps left and right sorry i forget the name mini band plank position moving legs left and right sorry i forget the name you do the mini band exercises three times and follow them with this weighted reverse lunge on the low bench reverse lunge with a hop up on the low bench low bench in and out plank enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u alloutannabel click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments f1flnh monday_10th_feb_2g_intel monday 10th feb 2g intel good morning from a very wet sydney very much an endurance day 23 min tread block lots of bosu action on the floor amp x200b tread one long block 5 min run for distance 2 5 min base 4 min run for distance 2 min base 3 min push 90 sec base 2 min push 1 min base 1 min push 30 sec base 30 sec ao wr amp x200b floor rower all exercises done on bosu block 1 2 min row for distance just once 3 rounds of 6 8 10 x single leg goblet lunge with dumbbell 12 x scaption with dumbbells 12 x alternate v sit ups 3 rounds of 12 x hip raises with dumbbell 12 x pullovers with dumbbell 6 8 10 x side plank hip dips each side if finished row for distance until time amp x200b block 2 1 min row for distance just once 3 rounds of 12 x lateral raises with dumbbell 12 x back extensions if finished row for distance until time amp x200b note hardly any of us got to the extra rows for distance all moving slowly after that tread block enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments f0ghsw saturday_3g_esp saturday 3g esp hey everyone welcome to the weekend so today s class sounds tricky and i ll try my best to explain it if you start on the treadmill you stay put for 14 minute go nowhere if you start on the rower or the floor it s like your own mini tornado rower rowing block 4 mins then floor 4 mins then rowing 4 mins switch to floor floor floor 4 mins then rowing 4 mins then floor 4 mins switch to treadmill in the floor and rowing blocks remember where you left off and pick up in the next block i hope that makes sense for everyone floor hip hinge low row 8 plank kick through 12 10 8 power pull up 8 hip hinge tricep kickback 12 10 8 hip hinge reverse fly 8 alt plank punch 12 10 8 treadmill 2 minute push 30 second base 30 second push 30 second base 30 second all out 60 second walking recovery 90 second push 30 second base 45 second push 45 second base 30 second all out 60 second walking recovery 60 second push 30 second base 60 second push 60 second base 60 second push 30 second all out rowing bock 4 mins 200 metre row medball overhead reverse lunge 12 10 8 6 4 2 if you finish go back up the reps woah that was exhausting writing everything enjoy your weekend everyone i m out

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments o7x4el saturday_26_june_2021_strength_2g_60_minutes saturday 26 june 2021 strength 2g 60 minutes i m going to say it its another doozy today the only plus about the 2g today is that there is no rowing and no pushes that s about it everything else is either difficult or awkward on the tread mill it is high inclines at base pace with one minute all outs to cap the blocks the incline efforts at base start at 90 seconds and then reduce but it is a pretty challenging tread block the floor has a lot of core work and then just lower body for the rest of it i am not a huge fan of lunges and there are a lot of lunges today with the weights work the first exercise is always weighted and the second is body weight only however i added weights to the squats to make it a bit more strength focused we also substituted the pivot lunge at the end with pulse lunges wasn t a huge fan of the template but it is pretty tough with the tread block i could have skipped the floor and not given it another thought i give it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 90 sec base 5 1 min base 90 sec base 6 90 sec base 90 sec base 7 1 min ao tread block 2 1 min base 6 1 min base 1 min base 7 90 sec base 1 min base 8 1 min ao tread block 3 30 sec base 7 1 min base 30 sec base 8 90 sec base 30 sec base 9 1 min ao floor block 1 8 minutes 3 rounds of 12 x sit up 12 total x bicycle repeat the following til time 5 each x static lunge 12 total x step out squat floor block 2 6 5 minutes 2 rounds of 12 x sit up 12 total x bicycle repeat the following til time 5 each x lateral lunge 12 x 1 1 2 sumo squat floor block 3 5 minutes 1 round of 12 x sit up 12 total x bicycle repeat the following til time 5 each x swing lunge 12 total x alt static pivot lunge

row benchmark coming up soon in july on the treadmill you have two blocks the first block is pretty brutal four 2 minute pushes with one minute base in between but it ends with a 2 minute push to 1 12 minute run distance give it a go and see how you feel knowing that for the benchmark you will have a bit more energy to give it on the second block if you are feeling good on the all outs see if floor it is a lot of single arm strength work using explosive tempo to get some of the power in on the second block i would go for lighter weights as the reps are quite high as a benchmark i used weights probably half of what i would do on a normal bicep curl and i was still feeling the burn all in all a tasty little esp template plenty for everyone and has enough to challenge anyone i give october 2021 hell week 3 row for ransom 2g 3g 60 minutes i promise to ask mrs dc to do a 2g a lot sooner than the 6pm class next time it looks like there were a few surprises for those who got to see her 2g intel later in the day than normal the 2g was definitely a lot harder than the 3g yesterday today there is only the single template as they have folded in a special rowing benchmark as part of the class a special 14 minute row for distance definitely the focus of the day is the benchmark row so if you can i suggest getting on the rower first so your legs are still fresh for the treads you have 12 all outs i didn t think this was too bad still plenty of splats but at least the walking recovery was not at a stupid incline if you are doing the treads first consider easing off a little on the all outs as you have the row block next none of the all outs are a minute and there is no incline yay on the rower it is a single block 14 minutes long my suggestion is to switch to the pacing mode of the monitor so you can see how fast you are doing the 500m blocks in i did struggle on this after the run and was in orange and red for pretty much the entire block the furthest girl in the tread block is pretty tortuous i took it easy after cmiyc yesterday and still made 3 miles in the run it is progressive inclines on the push efforts with some base in between the run for distances at reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments ky39qb saturday_16_january_2021_endurance_2g_60_minutes saturday 16 january 2021 endurance 2g 60 minutes first off for those who have been complaining about not enough lower body work you will need to apologise to your legs today it is all lower body today with long pushes and rows and a heap of squats on the floor today is pretty rough but at least there are no inclines the shortest and only all out is the 90 second run for distance our coach tells us that these are just all outs at the end of each tread block for the trx exercises on the floor we just substituted these for ab dolly work the trx is too fiddly to get in and out of i don t think i made it through the third round of exercises so my suggestion is that if you want to finish the three rounds maybe use lighter weights and power through it may also be a good idea if you are doing the tread block straight after the floor but then you have those rows as well enjoy you may need an ice bath afterwards tread block 1 3 min push 1 min base 3 min push 90 sec base 3 min push 2 min base 90 sec run for distance tread block 2 3 min push 90 sec base 90 sec run for distance floor block 11 5 minutes exercise group 1 sumo goblet squats sumo squats step out squat exercise group 2 trx knee tuck trx plank in and out round 1 10 reps of group 1 and 2 round 2 2 x 8 reps of group 1 and 2 round 3 3 x 6 reps of group 1 and 2 row block 90 sec ao row 90 sec recovery 3 min ao row try to double your previous distance 90 sec recovery 90 sec ao row match or beat the first row or half the second
