reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments m541xd 15_march_2021_power_3g_60_minutes 15 march 2021 power 3g 60 minutes today is the load and explode template on the treadmill it is essentially pushes to all outs and then on the floor it is heavy weights followed by a power move the rower they will get you to count strokes and then do 100m all out rows the whole idea is that you load yourself up before doing the explosive power moves e g push to all out stroke count before all out row heavy weight before a power move i didn t find today particularly hard but i think that is because of all the walking recoveries with the heavy weights on the floor and the rowing i would give it a 3 out of 5 for gentleness i think if you go heavy on the floor and follow up with the power move straight away you will get splats on the floor tread block 1 2 min push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec ao tread block 2 1 min push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 1 min push 30 sec ao tread block 3 30 sec push 30 sec ao 1 min wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao row block 1 4 minutes 15 stroke row 100m ao row 15 stroke recovery row repeat row block 2 4 minutes 12 stroke row 100m ao row 12 stroke recovery row repeat row block 3 3 minutes 10 stroke row 100m ao row 10 stroke recovery row repeat floor block 1 4 minutes 8 x goblet squat 4 x jump squat floor block 2 4 minutes 8 total x goblet alternating reverse lunge 4 total x jump lunge floor block 3 3 minutes 8 x double crunch 4 x power sit up

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments m1gip8 wednesday_10_march_2021_strength_3g_60_minutes wednesday 10 march 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes for all those missing lower body exercises then today is your day goblet squats deadlifts sumo deadlifts front squats etc the otf template designers have unfortunately gone for some funky combinations again but i reckon just go old school on them and just do the normal variations tread block isn t too bad highest incline is only 7 and it is only for 30 seconds i did ask the coach if he was going to make us do it all again at push pace and he just laughed only base pace for us today row block is pretty long and you will definitely get splats on it i rate today s template a 3 out of five the rows made it a little more difficult but not overly so tread block 1 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec base 2 30 sec base 3 30 sec base 4 30 sec base 5 30 sec base 6 30 sec base 7 1 min base 1 30 sec ao tread block 2 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec base 7 30 sec base 6 30 sec base 5 30 sec base 4 30 sec base 3 30 sec base 2 30 sec base 1 30 sec ao row block 1 6 5 minutes 1000m row 20 x curtsey lunge row for distance record total distance row block 2 6 minutes 30 sec ao row 10 x curtsey lunge 10 x medicine ball good morning repeat until time try to beat half your distance from block 1 floor block 1 6 5 minutes 8 x sumo squat to upright row 8 x front squat 8 x dead lift to low row floor block 2 6 minutes 5 each x goblet transverse squats 10 x sumo deadlift

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments m0poel tuesday_9_march_2021_endurance_3g_60_minutes tuesday 9 march 2021 endurance 3g 60 minutes nice endurance block today though was reasonably tough coming off the 1 mile benchmark longest run is a 2 minute run for distance but it comes off a long base the rows were reasonably difficult as well if you want to get far into the bonus rounds furthest anyone got this morning was to finish the 600m round with the tricep extensions the floor also had no rest so expect a few splats there i would rate today 2 out of 5 pretty tough tread block 1 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 45 sec push 45 sec base 90 sec push 45 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec base 1 min push 75 sec base 2 min run for distance row block 200m row 12 x med ball ground to bicep curl 300m row 12 x med ball ground to bicep curl 400m row 12 x med ball ground to bicep curl repeat 200m row 12 x med ball tricep extensions adding 100m each round record which distance goal you hit floor block 1 exercise 1 trx high row exercise 2 trx chest press exercise 3 trx alternate lunge with y raise exercise 4 trx squat jump exercise 5 sprinter sit up round 1 exercise 1 5 1 min each round 2 exercise 1 5 45 sec each round 3 exercise 1 4 30 sec each floor block 2 2 minutes of ultimate ab combo 4 x static crunch with scissors 4 x single leg v up

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments lx3q3f thursday_4_march_2021_infinity_3g_60_minutes thursday 4 march 2021 infinity 3g 60 minutes today is a sneaky benchmark day the rower component will be tracked in your challenges my suggestion is to start on the rower if you can and then do the floor and tread don t be like me and start on the floor and have the rower last to be honest you will get splats across all stations as every single part of this work out is challenging i would also time how long it takes you to do 2 rounds of floor exercises as this will give you a good gauge as to how fast you can do this in dri tri if you can do that in less than 6 minutes then that is a pretty good time to round off the good news the coach told us that monday is the 1 6km 1 mile benchmark again can t wait for the competitive types out there the fastest on the floor was 4 minutes 50 seconds furthest distances on the rower was just over 3k and the longest run was just over 4 km my suggestion is don t kill yourself on the run if you are going to be doing the rower next as that is also quite challenging this template is 1 5 on the gentleness scale super challenging tread block 3 min push 90 sec base 2 min push 90 sec base 2 min push 90 sec base 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec ao row block 14 minutes 100m row 20 medicine ball power jacks repeat decreasing rep count by 2 on the power jacks if you get down to 2 reps go back up again floor block 14 minutes 40 x bench hop overs 20 x bench tap squats 20 each side x bench step up 20 x push up 20 x plank jack 10 x burpee repeat until time

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments n3h6f2 monday_3_may_2021_esp_3g_60_minutes monday 3 may 2021 esp 3g 60 minutes after a nice relaxing sunday we are back to inclines it s a doozy today featuring run and row for distance challenges i think you will get splat points all across the stations today as even the floor has some challenging moves the treadmill has a little surprise that we didn t see coming the first distance goal is a 3 minute run for distance but then you back it up with a 5 minute round where you have to match your distance on massive inclines last couple of rounds are just flat road efforts i didn t go too hard on the first run for distance 847m but saw a few of the guys who got close to a 1 km really regret their life choices on the next block on the inclines i would start a bit under your base pace and increase speed as the inclines drop you should be able to do something between your base and your push on the last incline the row is also pretty challenging with a distance goal after the 3 minute row but with squat jacks as the restercise the last couple of rows are in time with the treads and are just all outs the floor is pretty challenging with burpees to squat jacks ground to presses plank jacks pushups and pull ups you should be able to get splats here as well for today s workout i give it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness it really felt like a mayhem teaser tread block 1 3 min run for distance record your distance tread block 2 reset your treadmill 1 min run 12 1 min run 10 1 min run 8 1 min run 6 1 min run 4 record your distance try and beat your block 1 distance tread block 3 90 sec run for distance try to beat half your distance from block 1 tread block 4 45 sec ao row block 1 3 min row for distance record your distance row block 2 5 minutes reset your rower 30 sec ao row 10 x jump squat repeat until time try to beat your distance from block 1 row block 3 90 sec row for distance try to beat half your distance from block 1 row block 4 45 sec ao row floor block 14 25 minutes 3 rounds of 8 10 12 x low bench squat jack 8 x low bench plank jack to decline push up 3 rounds of 8 10 12 x ground to press 8 x low bench burpee to squat jack 3 rounds of 8 10 12 x overhead tricep extension 8 x trx pull up

reposting content courtesy of u fit_steve click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments n3n4h2 monday_may_3_2021_2g_esp monday may 3 2021 2g esp get ready for a cardio blast on all three stations the floor is by far the hardest one i was in the red zone the entire first block tread block 12 5 min 3 min run for distance 90s wr record distance above and try to beat in the next 5 min with inclines 1 min inclined base at 12 1 min inclined base at 10 1 min inclined base at 8 1 min inclined base at 6 1 min inclined base at 4 90s wr 90s run for distance go for half as the beginning rower block 8 5 min 2 min row for distance record distance 30s all out row 10 squat jumps repeat the above ao and squat jumps x3 and try to beat distance you get 3 min to do all this so it s possible to do 10 squat jumps in 30s if you go faster and your distance falls short the coach pushed us to use the extra time to throw in a few extra strokes on the rower at the very end recovery then 1min all out row do half the distance floor block 1 12 5 min bench squat jacks 8 10 12 reps pushups to plank jacks on bench 8 reps do the above 3 rounds then dumbbells ground to press 8 10 12 reps low bench burpee to squat jack 8 reps do 3 rounds then repeat all exercises as 8 reps until time called floor block 2 8 5 min tricep extension standing 8 10 12 reps trx power pull up 8 reps do the above 3 rounds then dumbbell pikes 8 10 12 reps seated torso rotation 8 reps do 3 rounds then repeat all exercises as 8 reps until time called

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mzzhv1 28_april_2021_power_3g_60_minutes 28 april 2021 power 3g 60 minutes i am so disappointed that my rest day coincided with the everest prep day today is a pretty gentle power session mostly all outs with some power moves on the floor the tread block is fairly standard only a couple of pushes to all outs and the last block features a single one minute all out then they get easier for those doing marathon month i did 3 276 km 2 05 miles in the tread section by jogging the walking recoveries the row is pretty tough especially the first block only five people in our class got to the squat hold floor is reasonably easy i wouldn t be too stressed about any of the exercises there for today s template i rate it a 4 out of 5 for gentleness if you want to go hard on the rower to get the squat holds go for it but i didn t think it was that hard overall tread block 1 1 min push 30 sec ao 30 sec wr 30 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec ao tread block 2 1 min push 45 sec ao 30 sec wr 45 sec ao 45 sec wr 45 sec ao tread block 3 1 min ao 45 sec wr 45 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec ao row block 1 3 75 minutes 100m row 25 x jumping jack 150m row 25 x jumping jack 200m row 25 x jumping jack 250m row 25 x jumping jack squat hold til time row block 2 4 5 minutes 250m row 15 x squat jack 200m row 15 x squat jack 150m row 15 x squat jack 100m row 15 x squat jack squat hold til time row block 3 1 min ao row 45 sec recovery row 45 sec ao row 45 sec recovery row 30 sec ao row floor block 1 3 75 minutes 4 each x single arm snatch 6 each x balance bicep curl floor block 2 9 5 minutes 5 x bench power push up 5 x bench sit up to squat jump 5 x bench decline mountain climber 5 x trx tricep extension

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mxu1n5 sunday_25_april_2021_esp_60_minutes_2g sunday 25 april 2021 esp 60 minutes 2g for the fellow aussies and kiwis out there hope you are having a good anzac day there and are doing something for our national day of remembrance for today s template it is nasty esp with loads of inclines on the treadmill not much rowing today but you do have a bit of mini band work on the floor the treadmill is by far the hardest bit of this template especially the first 13 or so minutes with long pushes into one minute all outs you do have 90 second walking recoveries which i think you may need all of i got back to base for each one as i find 90 seconds a little too long but you will need quite a bit of it the second block is not that much better as it is just increasing inclines for the all outs my suggestion is that you can bring down the speed if you want to get to the all out feeling if you are feeling adventurous then just keep the speeds up for those doing marathon month i did 5 05 km 3 15 miles on the tread today outside of the warmup since everyone asks i do a 14kmh 8 75 mph base 16 kmh 10 mph push and a 18 20kmh 11 25 12 5 mph all out i also just kept my speeds constant throughout the tread block the floor block does have mini bands but no monster walks so i found them pretty doable for those missing their upper body work it is all upper body today for the 200m rows the coach was watching everyone and told everyone to get their rows in under a minute i treated them as all out rows and tried to get them all done in or just under the 30 sec mark the rows will get your heart rate back up so you should get some splats on complete all exercises at 8 reps

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mtnbgp monday_19_april_2021_strength_3g_60_minutes monday 19 april 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes today s early intel comes courtesy of mrs dc as i am taking a rest day probably just as well as i m not sure i wanted to take on the hills today even though i am only 5km short of my ultra looking at the tread block the 1 minute all out at 7 is a bit rude like always i would only do this at an all out feeling so it shouldn t be your all out pace the 2 minute bases at 5 is also reasonably tough and should feel like a push the row blocks are all strength pulls so low stroke rates but maximum power through the legs if you can push hard then you should be able to get over the 150m mark on the 15 stroke rows floor looks ok except for the silly bird dog low row i would always replace that with a single arm low row with the bench and go a bit heavier on the weights i would give today a 3 out of 5 for gentleness i don t think you will get many miles on the treadmill so may be a good one to rest i didn t get too much fomo today for having a rest day back in it tomorrow tread block 1 2 min base 5 1 min base 90 sec base 6 1 min base 1 min ao 7 tread block 2 2 min base 5 1 min base 90 sec base 6 1 min base 30 sec ao row block 1 6 5 minutes 200m row count strokes 10 x iso squat medicine ball front press repeat until time try to reduce stroke count on the row row block 2 6 minutes 15 stroke row 10 x iso squat medicine ball front press repeat until time try to get further on the 15 stroke row floor block 14 minutes 3 rounds of 5 x low band walk out 10 x low band trx low row repeat until time 5 x close grip chest press tempo 5 each x bird dog low row 10 x seated overhead tricep extension 10 total x plank pull through

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments eygddh monday_2g_power monday 2g power hey everyone tuesday tuesday sorry i mixed up my days and i don t know how to change the title a lot of people have been asking if this is a tornado and i can confirm that it is not hope everyone has recovered after doing a new base pace yesterday honestly i wasn t concentrating on the floor so if anyone wants to fill me in i will update it so sorry update think i remembered everything today s workout is a little nicer than yesterday s workout but i did it with my new pace pace of 15km so 9 32 mph for everyone else out there what s on the menu today 1 x 1 minute all out 2 x 45 second all outs 3 x 30 second all outs 1 minute 45 second and 30 second stroke rows pretty upper body and core focused on the floor floor block 1 8 5 mins 1 minute 26 28 stroke row pop jacks x 8 bridge row x 8 deadlift x 8 floor block 2 6 5 mins 45 second 28 30 stroke row clean to press x 4 each arm plank rotation x 8 block 3 4 5 mins weighted burpee x 4 30 second 32 plus stroke row power sit up x 8 tread block 1 8 5 mins 90 second push 60 second base 30 second push 60 second base 30 second all out 60 second walk 45 second all out 60 second all out 60 second all out 90 second recovery and back to base tread block 2 6 5 mins 90 second push 60 second base 30 second push 60 second base 30 second all out 60 second walk 45 second all out 90 second recovery and back to base tread block 3 4 5 mins 90 second push 60 second base 30 second push 60 second base 30 second all out that s all everyone have a great tuesday

reposting content courtesy of u alloutannabel click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments exvv4h monday_3rd_feb_2g_intel monday 3rd feb 2g intel strength day first session back since having my wisdom teeth out and had to modify a few things so forgive me if i ve mixed anything up due to brain fog new base pace try to increase your pace and maintain it throughout the blocks amp x200b tread block 1 6 5 mins 90 sec base at 5 7 pw 90 sec base 90 sec base at 5 90 sec base 30 sec ao wr block 2 6 5 mins 90 sec base at 6 8 pw 75 sec base 90 sec base at 6 75 sec base 60 sec ao wr block 3 6 5 mins 90 sec base at 7 9 pw 60 sec base 90 sec base at 7 60 sec base 90 sec ao wr amp x200b floor rower block 1 6 5 mins 15 stroke row 8 x squat with calf raise with dumbbells 8 x plank side steps with legs on bench feel like this has a proper name repeat until time including row block 2 6 5 mins 15 stroke row 8 x goblet squat with dumbbell increase weight from last block 8 x trx y raises repeat until time including row block 3 6 5 mins 15 stroke row 8 x sumo squat with dumbbell increase weight again 8 x hip raises with dumbbell 8 x plank punch outs repeat until time including row amp x200b really solid session and good day to push yourself to lift heavy enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments exdug3 sunday_3g_esp sunday 3g esp so another esp and a 3g for me today honestly i feel like it was one of the easier classes as it was kind of a tornado too many switches meant i couldn t get my heart rate up what s on the menu for today 3 rounds of 3 5 mins toss a coin for your row block you will either get 350 metres or 700 metre row go hard on the blocks or you won t get your splats treadmill block 1 2 minute push 1 minute base 30 second all out row block 1 person tosses a coin and if it s heads it s a 700 metre row then squat hold until time or tails is 2 x 350 metre rows with 10 squats inbetween repeat if completed floor block 1 10 x bicep curl 10 x front squat treadmill block 2 2 minute push 45 second base 45 second all out rowing block 2 repeat block 1 new person flips coin floor block 2 trx low row x 10 skier swing x 10 treadmill block 3 2 minute push 30 second base 1 minute all out rowing block 2 new person flips coin floor block 3 seated torso rotation x 10 recerse crunch x 10 plank leg lift x 10 have a fab sunday everyone

reposting content courtesy of u matthotlips click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments exefti sunday_2_february_2g sunday 2 february 2g notes it is a partner workout please no moaning it is a will smith switch hope this makes sense enjoy your sunday the 3g has been kindly posted by u sash_lex block 1 and 2 partner a does the floor once compete they switch with partner b keep repeating this tread or rower is determined by the flip of a coin the coin flip happens twice floor pacer 10 x bicep curls 10 x squats db 10 x low row trx 10 x reverse crunch so your leg end moves not you head end tread or rower run or row for distance block 3 and 4 partner does the 400m then switches as previous block with the coin flip tread or a rower pacer 400m run or row floor pick up where you left off 10 x hip swing db 10 x seated rotation db 10 x plank leg lifts

reposting content courtesy of u livingmemory click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments euu3gr 2g_tuesday_28_january_2020 2g tuesday 28 january 2020 esp notes it s a switch at the very front of the workout only row run block but row dominant mini band block all at mid band leg dominant tread 4 min run for distance switch rowers 4 min row for distance remember your distance switch you then peel off into a row run group and a floor group as follows row run repeat your distance as above 160metre 0 1 mile run 12 squat jumps row half your distance 160metre 0 1 mile run 12 squat jumps this repeats til time called note it is half your distance each time so row intervals are approx 4 mins 2 mins 1 min 30 secs row for distance if you make the last 30 sec row run jumps combo floor _block 1_ three mini band exercises which i m forgetting the names of rn as i m late for work but it s along the lines of crab walk hip raise with one leg off floor and toe reach _block 2_ alt reach on trx in a small studio this is a minefield lying on floor with legs raised slightly while pushing a weight above your shoulders look i m tired and forget the name elbow to knees enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments imp9s7 saturday_5th_september_2020_endurance_3g_60 saturday 5th september 2020 endurance 3g 60 minutes not a bad endurance template shame i was still a bit sore from yesterday s infinity template nice long pushes with only a couple of one minute all outs the floor is a bit odd a few new exercises there so save your energy for the treadmill and the rower the first block on the rower you are trying to get as many rounds as you can and then rowing that same distance in the second block furthest in our class was 1600m on the floor there was a new exercise i haven t seen before the alternating lunge matrix it is kind of like the woodchopper type exercise they do on the floor warmups but you are adding a lunge as well tread block 1 3 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 1 min push 1 min ao tread block 2 90 sec push 90 sec base 1 min ao row block 1 6 minutes 1 min row 12 x froggers repeat until time record your distance row block 2 6 minutes to row your previous distance 12 x froggers and then squat hold til time rest and then time a one minute all out row with the treadmill s last all out floor block 1 9 minutes 15 x hip hinge swing 5 each x alternating lunge matrix 20 x plank to alternating single arm press 20 x reverse mountain climbers floor block 2 3 5 minutes 15 x hip bridge 12 x seated torso rotation

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments im1a7a friday_4_september_2020_esp_3g_60_minutes_infinity friday 4 september 2020 esp 3g 60 minutes infinity today was the infinity workout one of my favorites i did check the wiki first and today s version does seem to be a little different each block is 14 minutes of hard work provided you push yourself if you want that dri tri feeling then start on the rower as it will work you through the order of the dri tri if you want to know your floor split time then look at the time after you have finished two rounds if you want to save yourself a little for the run then i suggest going hard for two rounds having a bit of a breather and then doing the rest if you are feeling competitive then we had a couple of people make it through the entire row block furthest i think was probably 2 5km all up four rounds of the floor exercises and over 3 5km 2 19 miles on the run tread block 14 minutes 3 min push 90 sec base 2 min push 90 sec base 2 min push 90 sec base 1 min push 1 min base 30 sec ao row block 14 minutes 100m row 20 medicine ball power jacks repeat row and decrease the reps on the power jacks when at 2 reps go back up again by 2 until you hit 20 reps each time with a 100m row when finished row for distance floor block 14 minutes 40 x bench hop overs 20 x bench tap squats 20 each leg x step ups 20 x push ups 20 x plank jacks 10 x burpees repeat until time is up

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nuogg7 tuesday_8_june_2021_esp_1_mile_benchmark_3g_60 tuesday 8 june 2021 esp 1 mile benchmark 3g 60 minutes benchmark day one of the hardest benchmarks in my mind just short enough to be called a power workout but long enough to burn the lungs and test the legs my advice for the benchmark is to just set the treadmill at an aggressive push and break the benchmark down into quarters at the 400m mark if you are not feeling that bad then start to up the pace progressively generally i feel reasonable for the first four minutes but then the last minute or so is just all burn and the legs start to give out on the rower it is all endurance row challenges with reverse lunges and the floor is some power moves with upper body weights i wouldn t take these too seriously if you are looking to get a good time on the treadmill for this template i give it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 14 minutes 1 6 km 1 mile run recover 160m 0 1 run 30 sec wr mbv c repeat until time row block 14 minutes 600m row 12 x reverse lunges 500m row 12 x reverse lunges 400m row 12 x reverse lunges 300m row 12 x reverse lunges 200m row 12 x reverse lunges 100m row 12 x reverse lunges floor block 14 minutes 3 rounds of 10 total x a skips 10 total x stationary 1 2 3 high knees 10 total x forward and back shuffle repeat the following until time 10 each x bench bird dog low row 10 each x hollow hold single arm close grip chest press 10 each x plank thread the needle with rotation

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nrpa8h friday_4_june_2021_esp_2g_60_minutes friday 4 june 2021 esp 2g 60 minutes otf love their inclines and squats this month plenty of them today on the tread thankfully we only have 30 second all outs but only one of them is on the flat road the rest are on increasing inclines on the plus side there are heaps of walking recoveries i kept the same all out pace for the inclines and walked the recoveries however you could probably get back to base earlier if you want some extra splats on the floor there are some long rows and yet more squats and variants of squats heaps and heaps of reps as well so you should get some splats on the floor if you go hard on the row and some of the power moves i didn t think today was as bad as yesterday 90 second all outs but the all outs at inclines will be challenging if you want to try and maintain your all out pace today is a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 90 sec push 90 sec base 90 sec push 30 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec ao 2 45 sec wr 30 sec ao 3 tread block 2 1 min push 1 min base 1 min push 30 sec ao 4 1 min wr 30 sec ao 5 1 min wr 30 sec ao 6 tread block 3 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec ao 7 75 sec wr 30 sec ao 8 75 sec wr 30 sec ao 9 floor block 1 15 5 minutes 800m row once only 20 x hip hinge swing 20 x squat to hammer curl 20 x reverse grip low row 20 x trx high row 20 x plank jack 400m row once only 2 rounds of the exercises at 10 reps row for distance until time floor block 2 5 5 minutes 5 x deadlift to upright row 10 x trx squat to high row 10 x plank jack to pop jack

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nqxc2l thursday_3_june_2021_power_3x3_2g3g_60_minutes thursday 3 june 2021 power 3x3 2g 3g 60 minutes coach told us that all sessions today will be run as a 3g so there is no 2g template essentially it is centered around 3 blocks of work with a short effort at the end on the treadmill it is all the same short push base and then a 90 second run for distance read all out you get a decent walking recovery in between but if you have been treating this as an aggressive push to all out you will need all of that time the last run for distance comes off a 90 second walking recovery so the theory goes that you should be able to up your pace rowers follow the treads but in the one minute base you get pulsing squat restercises our coach was calling out the furthest distances on the 90 second rounds and someone did get 610 metres i was a bit dubious as that is a ridiculous distance to get in 90 seconds my furthest was 532m and it just got worse from there especially as you have the all outs to start with and then the squats in the middle on the floor you should get splats as well half thrusters squats jump squats power pull ups the last round is an iso hold either push up or plank a couple of us managed the full 90 seconds for the iso push up hold all in all this was pretty tough i give it a 1 out of 5 for gentleness 90 second all outs will burn your legs and lungs tread block 1 30 sec push 1 min base 90 sec run for distance tread block 2 30 sec push 1 min base 90 sec run for distance tread block 3 30 sec push 1 min base 90 sec run for distance tread block 4 90 sec run for distance row block 1 30 sec ao row 1 min recovery 40 pulsing half squats 90 sec row for distance row block 2 30 sec ao row 1 min recovery 30 pulsing half squats 90 sec row for distance row block 3 30 sec ao row 1 min recovery 20 pulsing half squats 90 sec row for distance row block 4 90 sec row for distance floor block 1 3 minutes 10 x neutral half thruster 5 x clean to front squat 1 2 3 x full burpees remember where you get up to floor block 2 3 minutes 10 x trx jump squat 5 x trx pull up continue burpees where you left off increasing reps by 1 each round floor block 3 3 minutes 10 x sprinter sit up 6 total x palm to elbows continue burpees where you left off increasing reps by 1 each round floor block 4 90 seconds iso push up hold to failure plank til time

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nq5o28 wednesday_2_june_2021_endurance_3g_60_minutes wednesday 2 june 2021 endurance 3g 60 minutes tasty little endurance block today one of my favorites just long blocks with very little rest mrs dc is doing the 2g run row so will have some intel on that a little later only 3 5 minutes of base pace today rest is all push with a little all out at the end good day to see how you are progressing with new push pace or surprise yourself by upping it a little on the rower it is a pretty long block with distance goals and some restercise forward and back hops furthest distance in the row for distance at the end was 1250m on the floor it has some different moves we substituted the squat to upward rotation with single arm full thrusters and the transverse goblet squat to normal goblet squats the y squat essentially is holding your arms up in a y pose and then doing a bench tap squat you can also just put your arms behind your head like a prisoner squat good day i enjoyed it but was still challenging i give this a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 3 min push 90 sec base 3 min push 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 2 min push 30 sec ao row block 14 minutes 800m row 20 forward and backward hops 400m row 20 forward and backward hops 200m row 20 forward and backward hops 400m row 20 forward and backward hops 200m row 20 forward and backward hops 100m row 20 forward and backward hops reset and row for distance floor block 14 minutes 3 rounds of 12 x bench y squat 8 each x transverse goblet squat 20 total x static crunch with scissors 3 rounds of 12 x 1 and a half sumo squat 8 each x squat to upward rotation 20 total x single leg v up

tough anyway today is a strength session i found this a lot easier than yesterday but good fun nonetheless on the treads it is a pretty standard push base combo with inclines for the first block and then an incline challenge for the next essentially you do 160m 0 1 mile push and base runs and increase the incline by 1 each time you do a push max incline that anyone got to in my class was 8 which is pretty crazy our coach added a 30 sec ao at your highest incline to finish the second block the row has a stroke rate count for the first block second block you are doing a 200m distance challenge trying to beat your distance from previous block all the while reducing your stroke rate on the floor it is all upper body exercises using the bench at an incline for the first block and then switching to rows for the second block good day to up your weights 5 reps on the main exercise is not much all in all i didn t think this was too bad i give it a 3 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 1 min push 1 min base 1 min push 2 1 min base 1 min push 3 1 min base 30 sec ao tread block 2 6 minutes 160m 0 1 mile push 1 160m 0 1 mile base 1 repeat adding 1 to the push effort each time row block 1 6 5 minutes 15 stroke row 8 each x medicine ball wood chopper record your distance row block 2 6 minutes 200m row count strokes 10 x medicine ball good morning repeat taking 1 off the strokes required to get to 200m try to beat your distance from block 1 floor block 1 6 5 minutes 5 x incline close grip chest press 10 x incline bicep curl 20 total x static crunch with scissors floor block 2 6 minutes 5 each x split stance single arm low row 10 x overhead tricep extension 20 total x bicycle

another yay my suggestion is to either up the push or the base to get your heart rate up as they did feel a little short on the rower you have heaps of ground to presses with the medicine ball and a reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments q9lhfx sunday_17_october_2021_esp_2g_60_minutes sunday 17 october 2021 esp 2g 60 minutes this was a fun and deceptively hard template lots of moving around short blocks and a good mix of power and endurance the treadmill portion has 5 blocks in total but 2 are on the rower lots of timed stuff today it features two 3 minute run for distances so try to pace yourself a bit as your legs will be jelly by the end there is plenty of transition time to get to the rowers and back again so try and get back to base so your heart rate doesn t drop too much i didn t like the floor as much a lot more on the core moves and not enough lifting i didn t particularly like the walkout combo walkout pushup to high plank jack and then a pop squat nor did i like the push up to bird dog the double crunches are deceptively hard particularly the hollow hold for the floor blocks timed with the treadmill s runs for distances these are called burnout challenges the idea here is to do all the exercises with no rest the others are tempo triplets and feature the same exercises but with different tempos iso holds i saw a few people disagree with the feather rating yesterday but tbh i base it on how i felt compared to other workouts yesterday i thought was the easiest all week this is a bit harder but maybe not for the intensity of the runs rows but the efforts and movements felt a bit more difficult tricky than the ones during the week i give this template reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments q8wn6c saturday_16_october_2021_power_2g_60_minutes saturday 16 october 2021 power 2g 60 minutes this was a bit of a relief today after the hellish start to the week almost a pure power session and only a little bit of rowing in the 2g the treads all follow the same pattern alternating 30 second pushes and bases and a 30 second all out to finish my suggestion is to go faster than your normal push pace as you will find that you will not get your heart rate up fast enough if you are feeling up to it also add a bit to your all outs i tried increasing my incline at every all out and thought that was a good way to test out the post lockdown legs the floor features a low bench full burpee and plenty of 150m rows in the first block i definitely was getting splats on the floor especially if you are going hard on the rower for those who want a bit of a challenge the quickest time on the 150m row was 21 1 seconds the last block is on the rower and is timed with the treads you will do a ton of neutral full thrusters so pick a weight that will not cripple you over 2 minutes all in all this was easier than the last 5 days i did get plenty of splats but it does depend on how hard you push yourself you could easily do a green day on this template i think the burpees and all out rows thrusters at the end tip it over from a 4 to a 3 out of 5 for gentleness oh the coach also mentioned next tuesday 19 october is another hell week throw back tread reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mmdecb thursday_8_april_2021_power_3g_60_minutes thursday 8 april 2021 power 3g 60 minutes not the easiest of power templates but it is still a bit of a relief from the last couple of days in keeping with marathon month there are still plenty of distance gains in the first and third blocks the rowing is pretty tough with all the lateral hops and high knees you may also get some splats on the floor with the power moves as with any power days if you are not getting splats on the treadmill either up your base pace or get back to base on the all outs i tried just holding my push pace for the tread blocks 1 and 3 and only dipping down a little for the base alternating between 16 kmh to 15 kmh i rate today s template a 3 out of 5 for gentleness mainly for the row block tread block 1 45 sec push 45 sec base 45 sec push 45 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec ao tread block 2 30 sec ao 30 sec wr 30 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec ao 45 sec wr 30 sec ao tread block 3 45 sec push 45 sec base 45 sec push 45 sec base 30 sec push 30 sec ao row block 1 4 minutes 150m ao row 40 x lateral hops 40 high knees reset and row for distance furthest distance in class was 870m row block 2 4 minutes 150m ao row 30 x lateral hops 30 x high knees repeat until time row block 3 4 minutes 150m ao row 20 x jump squat 20 x jump lunges repeat until time floor block 1 4 minutes 5 each x low bench reverse lunge to hop 8 x hip hinge swing 16 total x low bench running man floor block 2 4 minutes 12 total x speed skater lunge 6 x goblet squat explosive tempo 12 x low bench plank jack floor block 3 4 minutes 6 x sumo squat to frogger 5 each x low bench reverse lunge

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mlmhgk wednesday_7_april_2021_strength_3g_60_minutes wednesday 7 april 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes walking celebration day nice template today pretty tough but felt a bit easier than yesterday s endurehell the walking celebration part is two 45 second walks at 14 and 15 inclines leading straight to 45 second all outs on the flat road tread block is pretty brutal as is the rowing 90 second pushes on inclines and 300m rows on repeat the floor block is not too bad i don t like the bird dog bench rows so i just substituted with a normal single arm low row the concentration curl is a single arm bicep curl where you sit on the bench and rest your elbow against your inner thigh curl up with the arm and try to get a full extension lock on the way down today s template i rate as a 2 out of 5 mainly for the 90 second pushes on incline and the long rows tread block 1 90 sec push 1 min base 90 sec push 3 1 min base 45 sec walk 14 45 sec ao 1 tread block 2 75 sec push 1 min base 75 sec push 3 1 min base 45 sec walk 15 45 sec ao 1 row block 1 6 5 minutes reset monitor 300m row 8 each side x reverse lunge with rotation repeat until time record total distance row block 2 6 minutes reset monitor 300m row 16 x alternating jump lunges repeat until time try to beat block 1 time floor block 1 6 5 minutes 8 each side x bench single arm high row 8 x overhead tricep extension 16 x bicycle press floor block 2 6 minutes 8 x seated uppercut to stand 8 each x bench bird dog low row 8 each x concentration curl

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mk61jn monday_5_april_2021_esp_3g_60_minutes monday 5 april 2021 esp 3g 60 minutes pretty tough template today we have a run rest on the tread and a very challenging row block no splats on the floor as it is all core stability with the bosu the treadmill is reasonable and you can go at your own pace the rower i found a little harder as there is very little rest between row blocks 30 seconds and if you are trying to beat your distance each round then you will be pretty much going all out for the first distance challenge getting your jump squats done and then going all out for the row for distance for the treads i would do an all out for the first couple of distances and then move to a push pace for the remainder you don t need to walk the entire time allotted either i would get back to close to green and then start the next distance goal furthest distance in our class for the run for distance was over 1 4km for the run for distance though he didn t take any of the walking recoveries in getting to the 2 4km mark i managed just shy of 600m taking some of the walking recoveries on the row block it is a push to all out row for the distance goals and then get the squat jacks done as quick as possible to get back on the rower for the row for distance furthest distance in our class on the last row block was a 450m row for the row for distance today was pretty tough i rate it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness for the tread and row blocks edit even though we only really had enough for a 2g we did a 3g instead i reckon mainly because of the row block for marathon month it would have been nicer to do a longer tread block but i wasn t complaining tread block 1 14 5 minutes 160m 0 1 mile run 30 sec wr 320m 0 2 mile run 45 sec wr 480m 0 3 mile run 1 min wr 640m 0 4 mile run 75 sec wr 800m 0 5 mile run 90 sec wr run for distance row block 1 2 5 minutes 300m row 25 x squat jacks reset and row for distance record your distance row block 2 3 minutes 400m row 20 x squat jacks reset and row for distance try to beat your previous distance row block 3 3 5 minutes 500m row 15 x squat jacks reset and row for distance try to beat your previous distance row block 4 4 minutes 600m row 10 x squat jacks reset and row for distance try to beat your previous distance floor block 14 5 minutes 2 rounds of 8 each side x bosu goblet static lunge 16 total x bosu alt superman 2 rounds of 8 total x bosu kneeling scaption 16 total x alternating single leg v up 2 rounds of 8 total x bosu chest fly 8 each side x bosu lateral crunch if finished then repeat all exercises as single block

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mitwz3 saturday_3_april_2021_strength_2g_60_minutes saturday 3 april 2021 strength 2g 60 minutes another tough workout today particularly on the treads very little rowing which will cheer up a few folks the floor features the ab dolly but overall it wasn t too bad your arms will feel like jelly after the main floor blocks mainly on the bicep curls and tricep kickbacks but it is straight forward enough to get through recommendations on the tread most of the incline work is at base pace with a decent incline for the all outs i would just go for your all out feeling which may be a bit off your normal all out pace the last block has all outs and walking recovery at incline you could probably increase your all out pace in this block given your starting from a walk on the floor the l raise is where you have one arm that is doing a front raise and the other is doing a lateral raise do four each side and then swap the arm positions for today s template i give it a 2 out of 5 for gentleness mostly for the tread work plus the ab dolly block tread block 1 3 min base 4 90 sec base 1 2 min base 5 30 sec ao 6 tread block 2 2 min base 5 90 sec base 1 1 min base 6 30 sec ao 7 tread block 3 1 min base 6 90 sec base 1 30 sec base 7 30 sec ao 8 tread block 4 30 sec ao 8 45 sec wr 8 30 sec ao 7 45 sec wr 7 30 sec ao 6 floor block 1 7 minutes 8 x ab dolly pike to knee tuck 8 x ab dolly rollout 8 x ab dolly hamstring curl floor block 2 10 minutes 300m row once only 20 24 strokes per minute 8 x bicep curl to uppercut 8 x good morning to tricep kickback 4 x each l raise 8 total x lateral lunge to scaption row block 30 sec ao row 20 24 strokes per minute 45 sec recovery row 30 sec ao row 20 24 strokes per minute 45 sec recovery row 30 sec ao row

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mgpfx5 wednesday_31_march_2021_power_3g_60_minutes wednesday 31 march 2021 power 3g 60 minutes pretty standard power block today the all outs are only 30 seconds long with very short push paces as well the row is probably the hardest bit of the whole template with all the squat jacks floor was reasonably easy as well again if you need to make it harder then just get back to base earlier and do 1 minute all outs instead of the 30 sec push to 30 sec all out furthest distance on the row was 550m we were also told to do all out rows for the first 30 seconds as well but i think that it is really just push rows just because of the rowing i rate this a 3 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 30 sec push 30 sec base 30 sec ao tread block 2 30 sec push 45 sec base 30 sec ao tread block 3 30 sec push 1 min base 30 sec ao tread block 4 30 sec push 30 sec ao 75 sec wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao 75 sec wr 30 sec push 30 sec ao row block 1 30 sec push row 30 sec recovery row 10 squat jacks 30 sec ao row record your distance row block 2 30 sec push row 45 sec recovery row 15 squat jacks 30 sec ao row record your distance try to beat block 1 row block 3 30 sec push row 1 min recovery row 20 squat jacks 30 sec ao row record your distance try to beat previous blocks row block 4 30 sec push row 30 sec ao row 75 sec recovery row 25 squat jacks 30 sec push row 30 sec ao row 75 sec recovery row 25 squat jacks 30 sec push row 30 sec ao row floor block 14 minutes 3 rounds of 10 x hip hinge swing 5 each x 90 degree jump squat 10 x pushup with row 3 rounds of 5 each x lateral lunge 20 x skater lunge 10 x trx single arm low row

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments mfzqm8 tuesday_30_march_2021_strength_3g_60_minutes tuesday 30 march 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes looked like i missed a good one yesterday definitely a 1 for gentleness today is a little kinder but not much more heaps of splats on offer especially on the tread and rower good news is that the max incline is only 4 bad news is that all the inclines are at push pace and you start with a 3 minute push at incline to 30 second all out in the very first block the next block features 90 second pushes at incline and finishes with a one minute all out row block is pretty tough we only had 4 people finish and get to the row for distance at the end the floor block i thought was great warming up with the mini bands and then straight into some classic upper body exercises i thought today was pretty tough i rate this a 2 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 1 1 min push 2 1 min push 3 1 min push 4 30 sec ao tread block 2 90 sec push 2 1 min base 90 sec push 3 1 min base 1 min push 4 1 min base 1 min push 3 1 min ao row block 14 minutes 300m row 16 x medicine ball reverse lunge to overhead press 300m row 8 x medicine ball squat to press 250m row 16 x medicine ball reverse lunge to overhead press 250m row 8 x medicine ball squat to press 200m row 16 x medicine ball reverse lunge to overhead press 200m row 8 x medicine ball squat to press 150m row 16 x medicine ball reverse lunge to overhead press 150m row 8 x medicine ball squat to press 100m row 16 x medicine ball reverse lunge to overhead press 100m row 8 x medicine ball squat to press reset and row for distance floor block 1 3 5 minutes 8 total x low band plank in and out 8 x low band trx low row floor block 2 9 minutes 10 x chest press 10 x chest fly 10 x hip hinge reverse grip low row 10 x trx high row

reposting early intel courtesy of u matthotlips wednesday 7 august 2g follow the leader run row let me start by saying i cannot remember the exercises in order or what i actually did to be honest know that it is upper body focused with a variety of burpee in each block here is what i can remember floor block 1 10 x chest fly 5 x burpee rollout 10 x spatulas scaption 10 x block 2 10 x bicep curl 10 x pop jack 10 x lateral raises 5 x burpee block 3 10 x thrusters 10 x plank low row things 20 x bench hop overs 10 x burpee run row 700m row 160m ao 1 600m row 160m ao 2 500m row 160m ao 3 etc how it works groups of 3 all start on the rower if partner a finishes first they go to the tread at sit at base with the same incline for that round partner a then waits for the other two to finish once all your group has finished you all start the run together if partner b finished the run first they go to the rower and row at a base pace once the whole group has finished the run you then start the 600m together so on and so forth notes this was a 2g not sure how it would work as a 3g it s not as complicated as i ve made out everyone is our class was really good at motivating each other still not sure about those exercises personally i took this day as a base day concentrated on the exercises and then being part of the team rather than gunning it we tried to finish the run rows as a team so there was very little rowing running at base

reposting early intel courtesy of u doc198824 wednesday july 31 otf workout good morning from sunny australia here is today s 3g layout sorry if there are errors on the order of the floor exercises it was a lot to remember today today s power workout was a killer it was kind of a tornado format with 3 5 minutes at each station tread block 1 3 5 minutes 30 second push 30 second base 30 second all out 1 minute walking recovery 30 second push 30 second all out row block 1 3 5 minutes 300 m row 12 froggers 200 m row 12 froggers 100 m row 12 froggers row for distance if you finish floor block 1 3 5 minutes 10 x 5 each leg weighted step ups onto the bench 10 or 12 x rotating squat jumps the ones where you rotate 90 degrees when you jump up keep repeating this dropping the reps of the squat jumps by 2 each time if you finish hold a plank tread block 2 3 5 minutes exactly the same as tread block 1 row block 2 3 5 minutes exactly the same as row block 1 except now it is 10 froggers instead of 12 floor block 2 3 5 minutes 10 x 5 x each arm hollow hold chest press thanks u orangegirl26 for the right name 10 x pop jacks keep repeating this dropping the reps of the pop jacks by 2 each time if you finish hold a plank tread block 3 3 5 minutes exactly the same as tread blocks 1 and 2 row block 3 3 5 minutes exactly the same as row blocks 1 and 2 except now it is now 8 froggers floor block 3 3 5 minutes 10 x reverse mountain climbers basically you hold a crab walk position and bring your knee up to your chest 10 x power sit up with rotation amp x200b phew i hope that is all right sorry if there are errors the otf brain is real today have fun i normally don t like this many switches but today was actually great you need the downtime between stations

reposting content courtesy of u alloutannabel click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments f8h919 monday_2g_intel_power monday 2g intel power morning here s the 2g for anyone wondering normally not a fan of power days but ended up enjoying the chance to push myself a bit amp x200b tready block 1 12 5 mins 2 min run for distance 90 sec wr 2 min run for distance 90 sec wr 2 min run for distance 90 sec wr 2 min run for distance wr block 2 8 5 mins 1 min ao 90 sec wr 1 min ao 90 sec wr 1 min ao 90 sec wr 1 min ao wr amp x200b floory rowey block 1 12 5 mins 12 x alt lateral lunges with dumbbells 12 x speed skater lunges 12 x plank with alt punch out arm raise complete 2 rounds of above exercises then 200m row just once amp x200b 6 x single leg reverse lunge into jump holding trx not pulling just holding to keep shoulders down 12 x weighted hip raises 24 x crunch with over unders complete 2 rounds of above exercises then 200m row just once if finished go through exercises in one block until time amp x200b block 2 8 5 mins do both bench exercises on right leg then both on left 6 x single leg bench lateral toe tap 6 x single leg bench power step up 10 x weighted double crunches 10 x power sit ups repeat until time amp x200b bit of brain fog for some of the exercise names so feel free to correct me enjoy

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments eeeu22 monday_2g_power monday 2g power merry christmas eve eve i loved today but then again i love most days except strength i think there was 7 all outs all together and we kindly got asked to up your all out by 1 to 3 each all out in km not miles floor block 1 rower 5 mins 150 metre row 10 overhead squat to press continue the 150 metre row and decrease the floor exercise by 2 each round floor block 2 honestly i m a bit hazy on the specific exercises 6 5 mins 10 weighted burpees 8 side plank rotations each side 8 power sit ups decrease burpee by 2 each round floor block 3 7 5 mins 5 snatches each side 12 x sprinter sit ups 6 single leg hip raises decrease snatch by 1 each round tread block 1 5 mins 1 minute push 1 minute base 1 minute all out 1 minute walk 1 minute all out tread block 2 6 5 mins 1 minute push 75 second base 45 second all out 1 minute walk 45 second all out 1 minute walk 45 second all out block 3 7 5 mins 1 minute push 90 second base 30 second all out 1 minute walk 30 second all out 1 minute walk 30 second all out 1 minute walk 30 second all out fin that all for today guys honestly i wasn t paying too much attention to everything that went on i was thinking about all the shopping i still have to do for chrissy so i may have missed a few things have a fab day everyone and have a great workout if you are going it s a goodie

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments edfv1h saturday_endurance_3g_ellen_workout saturday endurance 3g ellen workout hey ot fam today s workout was so good loved it lots of pushes to bases and why not throw in some 1000 metre rows just for fun should point out that between block 1 and 2 of the treadmills you probably only get 5 seconds to catch your breath before you have the 500 metre run for distance our coach said in the 2g it was a 1600 metre or 1 mile run for distance treadmill 8 5 mins 1 minute push 1 minute base 1 minute push 1 minute base 75 second push 1 minute base 75 second push 1 minute base reset treadmill and count to 5 because that s how much rest you get treadmill block 2 5 5 mins 500 metre all out 30 second recovery 160 metre all out 30 second recovery until time is called rowers 14 mins 1000 metre row 12 alternate reverse lunges 200 metre row 12 lunges x 3 1000 metre row 12 lunges 200 metre row 12 lunges repeat the 200 metre row and lunges until time is called floor block 1 9 mins 6 x trx single leg squat 12 overhead press with rotation 12 x bird dog 12 x bosu single leg v up floor block 2 10 x weighted lateral lunge 10 x bosu front raise that s all guys such a tough workout but i love myself a challenge especially at 6am in the morning sorry if i got any of the floor wrong honestly i wasnt really paying any attention to what the names of the exercises were hope everyone has a fab day and have a merry christmas

reposting content courtesy of u sash_lex click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments ebk8rf tuesday_endurance tuesday endurance morning ot fam today is a fantastic day especially if you are competitive with yourself like me this is a switch you kind of need it 2 x 10 5 minute treadmill blocks 2 x 3 minute rows 2 identical floor blocks treadmill progressive push 10 5 mins 3 minute progressive push starting at 5 to 8 above base and increasing 5 to 8 every minute 1 minute base 2 minute progressive push starting at your highest push from the 3 minutes again increasing 5 to 8 each minute 1 minute base 90 second push starting at your highest push from the 2 minutes again increasing 5 to 8 after 45 seconds 1 minute base 1 minute all out switch i got 2 633 kms or 1 636 miles for everyone playing at home floor block 1 3 minute row 10 bench step ups with weight each leg 10 lateral bench toe taps 10 seated shoulder press to stand 10 bench sit ups with weight switch tread block 2 10 5 mins no progressive push but try and beat your last score pretty sure this is where all of my red zone points came from 3 minute push 1 minute base 2 minute push 1 minute base 90 second push 1 minute base 1 minute all out switch floor block 2 it is the same as block 1 except you do 1 round of the exercises and then do the 3 minute row done hope everyone has a fab day oh and in the second tread block i got 2 667 kms or 1 657 miles

reposting content courtesy of u kaorian click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments e9upap friday_the_13th_endurance_3g_sydney friday the 13th endurance 3g sydney oh you know how this is going to go felt like a nice not too challenging workout but i got 9 splat points on the floor no idea and 36 in total compared to my average 20th so i d say this is a good one betty o meter 8 that running stretch is intense treads 13 5 minutes 30s push 30s base x 13 times 30s ao just the one after the last 30s base rower 130m row 13 squat jacks 130m row 11 squat jacks 130m row keep decreasing number of squats by 2 when down to 1 squat start all over again floor ok so we have 6 exercises we start with the first 2 x 2 reps then add the next exercise 3 reps for all 3 and so on 1 front squat 2 trx roll up 3 trx tricep extension 4 push up 5 plank jacks 6 burpee 1 2 x 2 reps 1 3 x 3 reps 1 4 x 4 reps 1 5 x 5 reps 1 6 x 6 reps 1 7 x 7 reps if you finish the whole block continue with 7 reps of each hope this makes sense

reposting content courtesy of u superspykay friday 10 11 19 2g early intel orange everest morning hope everyone is prepared for orange everest it s a doozy hopefully below isn t too confusing for people who haven t done it before amp x200b tread block 1 23 minutes first minute at 2 incline increase 1 every minute until 15 incline the top of everest first decrease is 1 then decrease by 2 every following minute until back to flat road 1 min ao amp x200b floor block 1 14 minutes close grip chest press seated hammer bicep curl bicycle x12 250m row repeat until time is called including the row reps for first two start at 12 and decrease by 2 each round amp x200b floor block 2 8 minutes bench plank low row seated overhead tricep extension straight leg raise x12 repeat until time is called reps for first two start at 6 and increase by 2 each round amp x200b have fun edited to add i feel like i should put it out there that this workout isn t as scary as it seems everyone in my class there was a whopping 11 of us ended up power walking towards the top and then picked up speed again on the way down also this is technically a run for distance your distance will be tracked and the goal is to beat the distance your old less fit self got last time

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments nlq90o thursday_27_may_2021_mayhem_5_lets_burn_rubber_2g thursday 27 may 2021 mayhem 5 let s burn rubber 2g 60 minutes early class today so i got to catch the 2g of this template and it is a doozy as the title suggests it is all about the mini bands on the floor so if you can t feel your shoulders or glutes after this you ve done something wrong on the treads it is not a run row they have invented the run frogger not sure which one is worse this starts with a mile run up inclines then you finish with froggers 160m 0 1 mile sprints down the same inclines then you run for distance the template didn t call for froggers after the last sprint but our coach made us do it just for fun if interested the furthest anyone got in the run for distance was 1 9km 1 19 miles my tactic was to start the mile run at push pace and start to decrease it from 5 onwards when you get to the froggers pause the treadmill so you can keep it at the right incline and then start it up as soon as you get back on that way you don t lose any time waiting on for the treadmill to get back to your incline maybe take a few moments to walk as it gets back up to speed so you can get your breath back i couldn t do the last rounds at an all out given there is no recovery but you should be able to do a high base to push pace once it gets back down to 2 4 you should be able to do all outs again the floor is also one long block featuring all the mini band exercises you love loathe you start with an 800m row just in case you missed the rower from the run frogger you then have ab dolly knee tucks to start then front raises lateral walks static crunches squats barely anyone finished the floor block no tactics here you just have to try and push through i reckon this is the second hardest mayhem template the run is not as bad as sunday s but is a very close second i give this a 1 out of 5 for gentleness tread block 22 5 minutes 1 6km 1 mile run starting at 1 and adding 1 incline every 160m 0 1 miles finishing at 10 10 rounds of 10 x froggers 160m 0 1 mile run 10 each round decrease the incline by 1 reset treadmill and run for distance 1 floor block 22 5 minutes 800m row once only 40 x ab dolly knee tuck once only 5 rounds of 8 x low band neutral front raise 8 total x low band plank in and out 5 rounds of 4 x mid band iso squat lateral walk 8 total x mid band squat to alt leg lift 5 rounds of 8 x mid band static crunch in and out 8 x mid band toe reach 40 x ab dolly knee tuck once only if finished good luck just do all mini band exercises as a single block

reposting content courtesy of u dc031114 click here to view the comments on the original post https www reddit com r orangetheory comments q6vdut 13_october_2021_esp_3g_60_minutes 13 october 2021 esp 3g 60 minutes ok now i am pretty sure i would have found today s class tough even before my 106 day forced hiatus from otf today s class is really just a mix of strength and endurance and i had a huge number of splats on the treadmill and rower the treadmill starts with a 2 minute push and then goes into push with incline combos then it ends on a 1 minute all out there is no walking recovery i am pretty sure my heart rate was in the red for almost the entire block bonus points if you add a little extra to the all out at the end i was pretty stuffed at the end but did manage a 2 mile block in the 3g which is rare the rower is all distance rows with medicine ball exercises to test out your hamstrings probably only a quarter of the class got to the bonus round the floor is probably the only place that you can hide from splats but if you want to do it properly load up the weights on the drop set and see if you can barely push out the 4 reps at the start my arms were shaking at the end of it for the person who was complaining about all the leg work recently here is your chance to not feel your chest and arms for the rest of the week oh and we have the hell week throwback tomorrow am sure that will be fun for today s session i give it a 1 out of 5 for gentleness it may have been a 2 pre lockdown but 30 splats 14 in red tells me this was particularly tough tread block 2 min push 1 min base 1 min push 4 1 min base 30 sec push 4 1 min base 30 sec push 4 1 min base 1 min push 4 1 min base 2 min push 1 min base 1 min ao row block 14 minutes 600m row 10 x medicine ball good mornings 400m row 10 x medicine ball good mornings 200m row 10 x medicine ball good mornings 50 x medicine ball power jacks 200m row 10 x medicine ball good mornings 400m row 10 x medicine ball good mornings 600m row 10 x medicine ball good mornings bonus repeat 100m row 10 x medicine ball power jacks floor block 14 minutes 3 rounds of 4 12 x close grip chest press drop set 8 x trx power pull up 3 rounds of 4 12 x seated low row 8 x bench power push up

11 october 2021 strength 3g 60 minutes strong and stable hooray we finally have had our restrictions lifted in new south wales and it means all the gyms are open again over 100 days since we were in the studio and it is a doozy to start back with think endurance session but with hills no push pace just all base at varying inclines and a short all out at the end i started a little under my pre lockdown base pace but then threw caution to the wind ignored the heart rate monitor and just did my normal hill base and all out the rower is all about the power strokes mixed with a set of balancing exercises with the medicine ball given i haven t used a rower for a long time i probably thought this was the hardest in the whole template i think they had also just refilled the water rowers so we got loads of resistance out of each stroke the floor is all strength moves followed by a stabilizing exercise with the trx straps and then a core exercise to get the most out of this i would do everything quite slowly and try to up your weights for the first exercises i quite liked the workout possibly because it is the first one in such a long time but had plenty of splats 25 so i reckon it reposting early intel courtesy of u livingmemory 2g 17 july 2019 2g orange voyage arc please read if you hate rowing please don t cancel because of this intel this was a super achievable workout enjoy it rowers this is a 22 5 continuous row block excluding the warm up similar to a traditional tread block these were timed intervals starting with a 3 minute push effort and a base recovery effort the interval times then varied let me have a think about the interval times or i ll edit with feedback _edit approx interval times_ thanks to u cr84 for the below the on efforts below were like a push effort off efforts were a base row it doesn t mean stop rowing 3 min for distance on 1 min recovery off 90 sec on 90 sec off 60 sec on 60 sec off 30 sec on 30 sec off 3 min on 60 sec off 30 sec on 30 sec off 60 sec on 60 sec off 60 sec on 90 sec off 3 min on to finish _notes_ take a row card to start on the rower row card holders warm up on the rower and stay on the rower for their block do not rack your handles at all during the row block goal was 5km as you completed each benchmark after 3km you got a little card indicating your distance 5km orange card treads and floor 20 5 minutes of work if you complete do the exercises only this is a run floor workout _one_ 0 2 mile run push pace 20 chest press on the trx 20 mountain climber things where you put knee to opposite elbow _two_ 0 15 mile run push pace or greater 15 low row trx 15 hip hinge swings with weight 15 tricep extensions with weight repeat all of the above _three_ 0 1 mile run all out 10 plank hip dips each side 10 power sit up repeat all of the above aaaaand repeat again in the final minute of the floor block move towards the rower and do a squat hold in front of the rowers on the corresponding station number to give them a little encouragement in the final minute i loved this notes this is not a switch enjoy

reposting early intel courtesy of u matthotlips monday 15 july power amp partner 2g this is difficult to write but i ll give a go the exercises are as follows 100x running man 90x crunch with over and unders legs 80x crunch with heel taps 70x bench hops 60x bicycles 50x toe reach 40x plank jacks 30x speed skater 20x high row trx 10x bench sit ups to courtesy jump soooooooo block 1 20 mins partner a starts on the tread partner b starts on the floor partner a runs for distance at push pace whilst partner b completes the first exercise partner b completes the first exercise and then moves to the rower partner a moves to the floor to complete the first exercise and moves back to the tread partner b moves back to floor and competes the second exercise etc etc the floor sets the pace whoever is on the rower keeps track of their distance block 2 20 mins same as before however partner a now goes to the rower exercises are now in reverse starting at the bottom of the list above and working your way back up notes it is a partner workout there is switching it is a power day take a tread card if you want to start on the tread good session for them splat points aiiiiight

reposting early intel courtesy of u matthotlips friday 30 august 2019 3g rower the rower is set for mph at the beginning you gauge your base mph and then use that for the push and ao paces 90 second push 1 min ao 1 min rest 1 min push 1 min ao 1 min rest 45 second push 1 min ao 1 min rest 30 second push 1 min ao 1 min rest 1 min ao 1 min rest 30 second ao floor complete 3 rounds of the following 4 x mid band squat walk poo things 8 x mid band tow taps each 12 x mid band static crunch stretching legs side to side repeat the below until time is called 12 x upright row 6 x bench fly each 12 x plank alt reach tread 90 second push 1 min ao 1 min wr 1 min push 1 min ao 1 min wr 45 second push 1 min ao 1 min wr 30 second push 1 min ao 1 min wr 1 min ao 1 min wr 30 second ao notes it is a challenge but rewarding i would definitely avoid starting on the treads tread and rower is timed together

reposting content courtesy of u allysonevans1 2g workout 10 22 19 i m in sydney australia went to potts point amazing staff and coach lucy this week from edmond ok so i m so excited to share some early intel endurance day treads block 1 45 sec 1 min 90 sec and 2 min pushes with 1 min base between each but the 2 min push goes straight into a 30 sec ao block 2 same thing but drop the first 45 sec push and 1 min base block 3 same thing but drop the first 1 min push 1 min base weight room bands block 1 3 monster walk 12 squat tap the bench with your butt do this twice 150 m row 12 11 10 shoulder press with a 150m row between each set block 2 3 lateral walks 12 squat with a leg kickback 2 rounds and then 150m row pick up on the rep count where you left off on last block so pick up on 9 reps if that s where you ended with shoulder presses and 150m row between each set again block 3 bands on wrists and do 12 total palms to elbows plank do this twice 150m row then back to the should press picking up reps where you left off with 150m row then each set
